While I was on vacation I noticed these monogram necklaces in a couple of boutiques and also saw them on Pinterest and decided to turn to Amazon to see if there were any available.  Low and behold I saw the XXL Statement Monogram Necklace and the reviews were great so I decided to take a chance.  I was a little confused at checkout on whether I put the initials I wanted in the right place, so I e-mailed the manufacture and they wrote back that they received my request and verified what I wanted, which automatically put my mind at ease about this purchase.  I ordered two, and they both came earlier than the two weeks, which was great.  I love the size of this.  The sterling silver is shiny and it looks so custom and expensive.  The price was way more affordable than at the boutiques that I originally saw them at.  I ordered the 18' length which is perfect for me and it came in a cute little box with a bow, so the other one I bought is ready to go to give my daughter in law for Mother's Day. I cannot say enough about how this is my new go to favorite piece of jewelry.  Something like this reminds me of a locket or a string of pearls, it is timeless and always in style, something I tend to look for in acquiring a collection of jewelry.  So far I have worn this with my work blazer, a long spring dress, and a tank top and jeans.  I love the versatility of this and I love that it signifies my new initials after getting married.  This is a fabulous gift for Mother's Day or a bride to be.  I have received compliments from my friends, family, co-workers, and perfect strangers.  I was a little hesitant about ordering something I haven't seen in person, but let me tell you...This is the real deal.  I would recommend this company to anyone that wants to invest in this beautiful necklace that I absolutely adore!!!
summary: My new go to piece of jewelry

reviewText:
Quality leather, that is soft/smooth to the touch. the product looks good, is simple, and thin, it does exactly what it needs to do without all the extra bulk and features some other cover/carriers have. The leather seems to scuff easy, but you can mostly just rub it for a second to remove.

I travel for a living as a Pilot, and for years, I've carried all my certificates/licensing in my wallet and then carried my Passport separate.  Unfortunately there is a lot of cards and paper I have to carry and this made my wallet enormous. I was able to to jam a bunch of the required documents into this thing. Now this cover bulges a little, as it was not designed to carry so many cards and documents in it, but it handles them fine and my wallet looks normal again!

This was simply the best Passport cover I could find, that kept the original Passport size,and would allow me to throw in a pants pocket, jacket, or in the pocket built into my headset bag. It isn't perfect, as I feel like I could have gotten more cards such as loyalty programs in here if the pockets extended vertically from the bottom to the top, or if there was another row of slots perhaps on the back.inside wall.

I would recommend this product and recommend the seller

A very nice cover for passports and also has four  slots for credit cards and two  larger slots for money or whatever one wishes to carry.  I visit Mexico frequently as I live close to the border and this item saves me from having to carry my wallet.  This item is well made and is genuine leather.  I never could find out where it was manufactured, but I want to say India?
High quality and practical. Just the thing I need for traveling abroad.

reviewText: Very high quality at a great price.

First, the good: the quality of the product is fine.

Now, the bad: the design is terrible. The problem is that when you have several credit cards in the wallet, they create a large bump. Since they are not placed across the full length of the passport, their is a thin area on the top (this is easy to see in the product picture). This cause your passport to get severely bent. I resorted to folding up some bills into a short, fat, wad and stuffing it in the top area. This made using the bill area difficult, though. I will now purchase a different product that has the credit cards arranged more evenly top to bottom.
summary: the good: the quality of the product is fine

Great for overseas travel! It hides the fact that your passport is a US passport! Being inconspicuous has its benefits, like not attracting thieves at the airport in after you walk out of the airport. It's the right choice if safety is a concern for you. But, that's not a big deal to me, as I bought it with the idea of being able to keep my emergency credit card in it and for it not to scream "AMERICAN!!!!!" It absolutely served its purpose, and will do so again on my next trip.
summary: Great way to remain inconspicuous when abroad.

Con
- Not sure how other passports are aligned, but the pockets adjacent to the passport holder should have been inverted 180 degrees. This would allow a person to place the photo ID portion of an American passport in the clear holder area and present it to officials without turning the wallet upside down

I had been looking at this ring for about a year. No matter what rings I looked at, I kept coming back to this one in particular. Amazon had only 3 reviews, and Ebay I couldn't find any for the jewelry-just the seller. I finally went to Berricle and I spent some time overlooking reviews-not on this ring but other jewelry as well. That is how I decided to purchase this ring. Berricle has 22 reviews not just 3 on this ring specifically. I have a very beautiful wedding ring set already but, I wanted somethign more playful and I have always dreamt of having a pear cut ring. This is beautiful!!! This is an affordable and fun alternative when you want to switch it up! There is a tag that is attached to the ring-so do not remove it unless you are *sure* you really want it-if you remove it it will be non-returnable and non-refundable. So, please keep that in mind. It came earlier than expected, I live in Scandinavia and it was estimated to arrive on April 29th. 2014 by 8p.m. and it arrived yesterday, April 9th! It came in a cute little box too! The only downside to ordering FROM Berricle (not Amazon) is that you cannot upload videos or pictures of your purchase and the rings do not come in quarter or half sizes,only whole sizes. I have smaller hands and fingers and I wear a size 5. The ring is smaller than the pictures on here might have you think, in my opinion that is not an entirely bad thing! It is delicate and beautiful and sparkles beautifully! Since, I do have smaller hands I think it looks perfect! If you are looking for really big and flashy this might not be "it". I have uploaded some pictures and I sincerely hope that it helps someone make a decision! So far, it's been almost 24hrs and I have washed my hands, done laundry, and tossed stuff into a dryer with no problems. I slept with it on last night and no problems. If there comes a time where something happens I will update! :) **Also, I'm Erik's wife just so there isn't any confusion! :D
I was beautiful but the ring was too small so I never really got to enjoy it and had to return it.

Overall not a bad ring, but just too small on my hand once I got it on.

reviewText: Metal Masters make a high quality ring and have amazing customer service! I strongly recommend going to a jewelry store that sells comfort fit bands and getting sized for them before ordering so you can take the guess work out of getting the right ring and avoid having to pay return shipping!

The mask is very "life like" to the extend that a slightly smaller horse head on a human body can really be life like. It's not cartoony, it actually looks like a horse's head. The problem I have with it is that it seems like the "neck" is a little too short, meaning the mask rides high. It's not a problem for a young adult or a child, but it makes wearing it for extended periods of time difficult for an adult. I feel like I'm having problems breathing, and my glasses fog up quickly. That makes doing anything other than light walking a challenge, and I usually take it off a few minutes after I put it on. That being said, it's a fantastic novelty item - I walked into my child's daycare with it on and was instantly the start of the show. Helps if you can also sing the Mr. Ed song - because no one can talk to a horse, of course, unless that horse is not a horse at all but rather someone wearing a horse head. I expect I'll be having quite a bit of fun with it, even if I'll do it in short spurts.

reviewText: 5/5 would buy again

This mask looks great from the outside; quite humorous and believable from a distance. It does have several considerable shortcomings however. While wearing this mask you can only make out about 5 % field of view compared to normal. I expect to lose some peripheral vision with any mask but this one makes it damn near impossible to see where you're going or what you're doing.

The inner coating has a strong smell and does not allow any air flow in or out, making it quite uncomfortable when wearing for longer than a couple of minutes. After a minute of breathing I can already feel the accumulation of moisture & heat on the inside.

It's a fun mask to wear for a minute or two, but don't expect to go to a Halloween party or social function with this on or you'll likely end up either passing out or walking into something.

Pros:
- Humorous & realistic from a distance
- Cheap

Cons:
- Virtually zero visibility
- Zero air flow

The smell went away after leaving in the sun a few days to air out. The rubber is thin, so I cut the bottom out of a solo cup and put that in the end near the mouth. Otherwise it bent in weird ways. Overall, for the price it's cool.

reviewText: I never got this mailed to me in a timely manner and I am very dissapointed in this fact. I look forward to when I do get it at the end of the month.

As a result, the mask has become a minor meme: A compendium of "best" horse head still shots can be seen on imgur: [...]
LittleVMills even did a "horse head mask" video while playing one of his metal guitar solos... [...]

When you get it, it will smell pretty strongly -- wipe out the interior with a pleasant-scented cleanser and prop it open in front of a fan to deodorize it for actual wear. Severely limited field of vision: do NOT drive in this thing, or cross streets, etc.

reviewText: The material is thin and has a strong latex smell. You can only see out of the nose holes. Super fun at parties, jokes, and answering the door when a salesman comes.

Oh my...........the chemical smell of this mask is completely overpowering. While it is funny and worked as the gag gift my son wanted, the smell prevents him from being able to wear it more than 2 seconds at a time.
Smells like Latex until you wash the inside out with soap. It looks good though and is a lot of fun!
We have no complaints on this item. It came, in a timely manner, exactly as it is pictured. My son has gotten a lot of laughs with this!
I LOVE IT IM CRYING bYE ITS PERFECT AND IM SO HAPPY YALL ROCK UR THE BOMB DIGGITY THANK YOU

reviewText: Was very smelly plastic/rubber, but very fun to wear!

Product looks cool and its entertaining, but smell is unbearable and does not go away. I tried everything possible, soaking in soap water, scrubbing in hot water, spraying with perfume, nothing worked. Only time might take away the smell of vinyl, not good if you need to wear it right away.
This was a hit!  Need to let it air out for a day or two, does have a smell when first opened.

reviewText: My daugher's girlfriend got this and she loved it.  Now all (3) of my girls have horseheads and they will be getting their picture taken with all of them wearing them!

The head itself is alright, however, the excessive stench will knock you over months later.  We've aired this baby out since it was received and the stench is still too overpowering to allow you to wear the mask.  Visualize an entire room filled with markers with their lids off and you might be able to imagine the smell.

I would stay away from this product.

Got this for my 13-year-old son for Christmas.  Makes for hilarious pranks and fun!
It seems to be well-made, and we haven't had any problems.
When we got it, we did need to do something to get the overpowering latex smell out of it.  Washed it out with dishsoap (was careful not to get the hair in the water), and then sprinkled the inside with baking soda and hung it out in the sun for a couple of hours.  Not sure what the neighbors thought about a horse head hanging in our tree, but it worked fine!
summary: Loads of fun for the little amount of money we spent

reviewText: Bought this as a gag gift for a friend.  Didn't think I could afford one as I am a high school student but found this on the web and took a chance!  Price was cheap but the quality was not; the coloring is realistic and of sturdy material.  The funny part?  My friend bought me the same gift!!
My almost 17 yr old asked for this for Christmas; it's been awesome!! So funny he's messed around quite a bit; his friends love it too. A teacher already had to tell him stop horsing around!
i mostly use it on Saturday's when the guys get drunk and they start acting dumb. its a lot of fun.
I gave this to my nephew for Christmas.  Every other gift did not matter.  Pretty scary, creepy horse, and I hope he does not get fired from his job or put in jail bacaus of his Uncle.

This is so much fun to play around with! I like to bring it to stores, and my friends house to scare them.  Just a warning, it does smell very strongly almost like paint, but that does not take the fun out of it! This is a very good buy :)

This thing is awesome!  I laugh so hard when my son wears it.  When I ordered it, it was to arrive after January 16th (from Hong Kong, I think) but it ended up arriving well before Christmas.  I have a great picture of my kid wearing it in front of the Christmas tree.

pros: arrived 20 days before expected delivery date! wow!
looks great but appears to be deformed if you look at for too long (snout too short) - will check with real horses later

cons: stank to high heavens!!!
doesnt breathe well
must let it ventilate for several hours before use

conclusion: would definitely buy again if i needed a second one, but make sure you order it to arrive a few days early so you can air it out before use
summary: the horses have accepted me as one of them

reviewText: I bought this for my brother for Christmas. I unwrapped it because the other reviews said it smelled strongly so I planned to air it out until Christmas. It was wearable when I gave it to him and he loved it. And now he won't take it off.

It looked very different from the picture...horrible quality and deformed from being smashed into the box, no matter how much I tried to fix it. Definitely not what I expected. Also there were some parts that were messed up in production-I don't know how to describe it but all the latex bunched up together in spots. I will be returning this and ordering the slightly more expensive but reportedly better quality mask from Accoutrements. The smell was awful as well, but I can't really complain about that, as I was warned ahead of time by the other reviews. I don't know if everyone got a different mask than me, because I can't believe this has four and a half stars on here. Very disappointing.
The mask fits comfortably over head. It is made of good quality material. The only complication is the packaging powder that needs to be washed off before use.

My people have gone through so much. I can't walk down the street with out someone giving me strange looks! They call me hurtful names like Sea Biscuit, High Ho Silver, Ponygon and even pokey from Gumby... ,but the most hurtful of them all is when they straight up call me Horse. We are the proud Hoofed-Americans and I will not stand for all these hateful terms. One more thing, would you stop asking why the long face!
I love this. I mean the latex is pretty horrible but overall it's exactly what I wanted. Recommended for everyone.
Fun product . It is kind of hard to see out of but its a lot of fun . SMELLS like latex bad but after a few days it goes away .

Extremely satisfied with my purchase!!
The person I gifted this too was in complete chuckles with it !!
I love this thing!!!
I would buy another one of these. They are funny and my dogs go nuts. They are perfect. They come from China, but i got them very fast.
summary: Smells at first, but goes away in about an hour. Best thing i've bought.

reviewText: I think this mask is great for Halloween as it is creepy enough to scare people. I think the only down fall is that it's hard to see out of.

reviewText: This product is absolutely the funniest thing ever. Wearing it in public attracts tons of attention and compliments. It is of great quality however it does smell strongly of plastic when first opened. The smell faded away after being aired out for a while

the mask looked great. hair is fabric and the paint detail is great.

the only 'eye holes' are the mouth and nostrils. so don't expect to see much.

when i took it out of the bag it REEKED! the smell of spray paint and rubber material.

i had to leave it outside to air it out. but still stinks up the room it occupies.

still hilarious though

I've always wanted to be a horse and when I saw this mask I thought I may finally fit in with the locals. They saw right through my costume. All I wanted was to fit in with my horse brothers.

Would not purchase again.
My son loves this mask. The only bad thing is when you get it it has a strong plastic smell to it.
I like what I saw, but it does have a smell to it so let it air out before putting on :)

reviewText: This is hilarious!  You have to get one....we paired it with coconut shells for the Monty Python horsey hoofs sound....it is hard to see out of the snout however...VERY difficult to go Halloweening with....you would have to be led with a bridle....

reviewText: ....No. I don't even have it yet. It says I will get it 'December 13, 2013 -  January 2, ' although I ordered this November 18th.

Bought this for my grandson who loves kidding around with people.  He absolutely loved  it. The only complaint was that it is very hot with it on.  It needs more air vent holes.  Anyway, it was good quality & was exactly what I needed.

reviewText: Would shop again from this vendor. Mask shipped quickly - perhaps too quickly, would rather have time for paint odor to dissipate before receiving, however, after a couple of days of airing out has reverted to its natural latex smell - which is fine.

I wanted this mask for a few years now and to the disapproval of my parents, I bought it! It is perfect for random entertainment. I'll sit outside on a nice day and act normal and laugh at the looks I get. I did get the little phone thing with it, but I never use it. This mask is perfect for whatever your needs are! It came a lot faster than it said it was going to. Get it! :)

Having WAY too much fun scaring the dogs with this!  My son greets the dogs normally, and they love him.  He goes into the next room, puts this on, and is right back.  They want to attack him!!!  Fun fun fun
summary: Dogs hate it, we love it. Hee hee

reviewText: Me and friends figured we should start a thing at school for wearing horse masks. I ordered mine first the. Everyone else did, from this same exact seller. We all ordered the exact same mask but mine took a significantly longer time to arrive. Even though I bought it first. When all my friend's masks came in they were great and I couldn't wait to get mine. But I waited for a while and it still didn't come in. I was starting to get a little worried when it finally came in but to my surprise, even though we all confirmed ordering the same mask from the same seller for the same price, my mask was different from theirs..... Not in a good way. It is extremely discolored, much less detailed, and feels like it is made cheaper. Now all I have is a cheap nock off of the real masks my friends ordered. Not to mention that phone stand thing wasn't included in the package either, just saying.
I got what I paid for, but the neck was very short so it would hang open and it's quite annoying.
Loved it!! It is well made and sturdy.  The mane and forelock hair is really nice.  It is quite stinky inside but so much fun, especially wearing it while I'm riding my horse!!!

I'm not sure what the complaining about the shipping is, it shipped from Kentucky (but it does say it's made in china) to Seattle in 2 days like the prime shipping said. The mask itself is hard to see out of, mostly because the eye holes are the horses mouth and nostrils. I swear this is the real one that you see in all the videos and stuff, and if it's not, well its a dang good knockoff! because it looks just like the ones in the videos and picture. The only possible problem is that it does smell like spray paint. I thought that people were making some mistake saying that it smells like spray paint and meaning to say something else, but it smells like freekin spray paint, however its odor is not that bad. It's just been here for about 5 minutes and I'm wearing as I type, and it's already scared the crap out of the kid that just walked in the door. This is definitely going to be my next big party item. i just might want to air it out before I go to any parties because the fumes might make me a bit sic if i wear it for more than a few hours. If you like partying and being a weirdo like myself... GET THIS ONE!!! its cheap and awesome. I'm also not sure what the other item in the picture is, but whatever it is, it's not in the box.
summary: it shipped from Kentucky (but it does say it's made in china) to Seattle in 2 days like the prime shipping said

reviewText: This horse mask has made an ass out of me.  I just love having fun with it around the neighborhood.  Everybody wants to ride me. I was hoping it would have been a little bit thicker rubber but I guess that would be the higher cost ones.  Hard to see and breath out of so I would not recommend driving, jogging, or swimming in it.  Otherwise it's great.
summary: Who can't use a horse head?

reviewText: Looks pretty good.  Nose area is a little flimsy and like everyone noted, it stank horribly of chemicals for at least a week until completely aired out.  Other than that and a little bit of hair loss, it's tip top.

This mask is awesome!  Rubber, extremely well hand painted, with fake fur for the head and mane.  It came out of the wrapper smelling of strong paint, but a quick wash in soap and water and it is good to go.  Looks very cool.  Picture is very accurate.  My big fat adult head fits in it too.  Was worried about the long ship time as it was being shipped from China but got here in in time for Christmas, 3 weeks.  Seller contacted me and guaranteed it before Christmas. :)

Exactly what I expected, thank you. The only complaint I have is that the smell of the horse head is UNBEARABLE. Reeks of chemicals and paint. So, until it airs out completely, its impossible to wear.

Other than that, it's great. wanted the laughs I have received when I hold my breath and try it on hahaha.

Sorry for the complaint, but it's the truth. If I would have known it was going to be impossible to breath in, I would have only purchased one mask (I bought a white horse mask as well when I ordered this one) and passed on this one.

**UPDATE**
The mask is very wearable now! Smells how a mask should smell, no chemicals or paint. Very pleased now with my purchase!

Thank you so much (:
summary: MUST LET THE MASK AIR OUT BEFORE WEAR!

reviewText: The product is fine.  Shipping took about 40 days. Was hoping to order at beginning of October for Halloween. It came several weeks after Halloween.  Plan for the really long lead time.  Inside does have a strong odor as reported by others.

reviewText: It meets the criteria of looking like an ugly Horse head. My Granddaughter will love it. Nothing else to say.

reviewText: This was the fastest delivery I've ever gotten from Amazon. It came 3 weeks before the estimated arrival date and I'm very impressed. The product is also great, it may smell for a few days, but it's worth all of the laughs. I definitely recommend this. I bought the product, it came fast, what more could you ask for?
Never a dull moment with a good scary horse mask in the house. It needed some serious cleaning and airing out to get rid of the chemical smell, but it has more than served its purpose since then.
My 14 year old son had too much fun on Halloween with this crazy horse head.  He was the grim reaper of horses.  Made for a great costume.  Good quality material and looks better in person

reviewText: My son is thrilled with this mask however we wanted it for Halloween and it arrived 2 days later. I was not too thrilled with their sneaky tactics but I guess we'll save it for next year.

reviewText: The mask is really good and people really high balled the plastic smell. It was a moderate smell and the quality was nice. Would def recommend. Came a few days before estimates delivery date and does not come with a phone stand.

The mask is awesome and I highly reccomebd buying it, the smell of plastic is strong but all you have to do is put boiling hot water in it and make sure not to let the water touch the hair and you should be good .
Great fun during this last Halloween.  The kid loved this thing and it came in the mail quickly.  Easy to breathe in and decent vision.

*horseheading Intensifies*

Horses are the apex predator of the farm kingdom, I understand that it sounds ludicrous

My teen aged son got this for Halloween & wore it with my  trench coat. Easiest costume ever & a total hit at school - even the teachers thought it was hilarious. He read other reviews & rinsed it out before wearing (probably a good idea anyway), managed to keep it on all day & it's in good enough shape for at least another go. Bang for the buck = fantastic!

Before you hit "Buy," check where it's being shipped from. I paid a couple bucks more to have it come from PA vs China & it arrived within the week.
This was a gag gift for my son for his birthday!  He loves to goof off with it!  It is so cool looking!
I love the mask but it smells like spray paint, pain in the butt to remove the smell. Great to troll
I ordered this for my daughter and she loved it. It was great quality and worked well for her costume. It does have a very strong latex smell.
great buy 5/5

I bought this mask for my cow to wear as a joke. Also as a comeuppance too, if I'm to be honest. This particular cow had become sort of arrogant and catty around the farm, constantly mocking the horses and hurting their feelings. I thought maybe she should walk a mile in their horseshoes. Joke's on me now. This mask was far too realistic and the other cows now think she is a horse. She's been completely ostracized by the herd and what had started off as a Mean Girls situation is quickly spiraling into something far more dangerous. The horses (who are also fooled by the mask) have taken her in as one of their own and she is organizing them with plans of revenge. The pigs have begun mentoring the cows, for their own fiendish ends and I fear we are very close to an Orwelian uprising, especially if they happen to discover my ruse at the center of all of this. Your "novelty" product has ruined my farm. I fear for my life. Great product though. Highly recommended.
I loved the mask but didn't get the stand it was initially suppose to come with. It would have been nice to have the stand to help keep the mask formed.

it arrived on November 8, 19 days after I ordered it and its the same one that sells for $35 so that was good! but when I put it on, I saw the world differently...
I had a strong craving for carrots, apples and grass...I feel strange and I don't kknow whudxstawyoguNEEEEEEIIIIIGGGGGHHH

reviewText: Nicely styled and is fairly durable considering it's a $13 mask. Survived Halloween OK even after taking it on and off many times to catch your breath. It's kinda claustrophobic in there and you have to see out of the nose holes so don't plan on driving in this!

reviewText: its great, everything i wanted. i ordered it for halloween, but it was late. it came from china. i drove my car into a bridge....i don't care!!!

this is amazing BUT i just need to say somethin about the smell. when i opened my mailbox a really strong stench of latex blew at my face. i flipped the mask inside out and washed it in warm water and soap right away and put it in my room. but it still stunk up my whole room and my eyes are still burnin from puttin on the mask for a minute.

reviewText: So funny when wearing it!!! It is awesome and looks hilarious but unfortunately it stinks up the whole house the first few days and it smells like rubber so defiantly keep it outside at first but otherwise perfect!

Really the only downside is that, at least on mine, the neck hole never really closed quite right and made the neck seem fat. Because of this it kind of threw off the look a little.

Overall a good mask at a good price but not the best.

reviewText: This thing definitely met my expectations. I got it for a friend and he loves it. It seems awesome for playing pranks or just weir ding people out. It's pretty good quality, and it's also pretty big, so it should fit pretty much anyone who wants to wear it.

reviewText:
While this mask was meant for someone else, I'm uncomfortable keeping it as I have children and a small dog that could also be affected by the strength of the fumes.  After 60 seconds of wearing this mask, I had an adverse reaction that took two hours to dissipate.  My eyes were stinging and became inflamed.  I left it out overnight to air out but it just fumed up the room it was in and my eyes are puffy again.

I DO NOT HAVE AN ALLERGY TO LATEX.  But this mask's fumes are potent enough that I think Amazon might want to investigate this item as potentially hazardous.  It's possible that the masks received by the previous posters were from another batch, but the one I received definitely raises some red flags.
summary: Red flags: strong fumes, adverse reaction

reviewText: Chicken head isn't creepy at all compared to the horse. What the cluck is going on in the world today?

reviewText: Amazing Product! Smell of Latex wasn't as strong as i thought it would be so its PRETTY NICE! Order Came WAYYY sooner than i expected over TWO weeks before my Expected Delivery date! Im So excited! Looks Great, Perfect fit, and its worth the Pay! Cant wait to freak people out with it!
Makes a great cheap costume. Does look a little creepy because it looks "life like" but overall exactly what I expected
Just not as good as you would think for the money. They get to loose to quickly and start to feel like regular boxer shorts instead of boxer briefs. I've bought Hanes that were better than these.
Good quality, but price is on the high end. However, this is my second time I but the same brand, which is one of the best out there
1 pair ok the 3 pack had a hole in them, other then that they are fine, they feel good and don't ride up

reviewText: This was easily a great buy for me.  I've have these for a while and I have not complaints.  They aren't tight and fit snugly on every covered part.

Love these boxer briefs. the pouch is very comfortable. Ive worn these for several years and keep rebuying them as the old ones wear out. They aren't the best at wicking away moisture, but they do dry quickly when you are sweating a lot.

reviewText:
Here's my take on all the 1-star reviews for these briefs and why:

I initially bought a 3-pack through amazon.ca (I'm in Toronto), absolutely love them; then found them here on the U.S. site for much cheaper so purchased them again through a U.S. friend's account.

Although the tags of both sport the same product number (R/N# 97404) the better-fitting first set are made in Thailand and are 82% cotton/8% spandex, while the U.S.-sourced briefs are made in Bangladesh and are 100% cotton.

The first set (Thailand ones) sport the classic 2Xist "pouch" and fit the thighs of us bigger guys perfectly, maintaining their shape all day; while the newer designed Made-in-Bangladesh versions have a much smaller pouch and lose their shape in the legs within an hour or two of wear.

Those of us that are fans of the classic 2(x)IST brief need to email the company's head office in Dayton NJ (e2xist@2xist.com) and voice our disappointment at the loss of the original product.
summary: When a Great Product Goes Bad

reviewText:
These appear to be a new style. I have been wearing 2xist underwear for at least 10 years. I needed some new ones. These are NOT the same as the regular fit. They are low rider, there is no "pouch" for the equipment, and by midday, you will be wearing a short boxer style g-string. Not comfortable at all. I wish I could return them, but well, they are underwear.
I will be re-ordering the style I more traditionally was wearing.
summary: These fit differently than others you may have worn before!

I have always been wary of yoga pants because the ones I've bought either shrunk in the wash or began to "sag" and "loosen" after a day of wear. They've always been very uncomfortable and unflattering. It wasn't until a few friends of mine had a talk about yoga pants that I decided to give them another shot. The key difference: I decided to buy a more expensive pair instead of the typical $6 or $10 pants I get.

The difference is astounding! This isn't a very expensive pair, but the $10 extra really made a difference. These pants are made of a very breathable, soft material that also fit snug against my body without squeezing me. It really flattered my curves, especially my butt! They were also long enough that they didn't look ridiculous on me. The best part: it withstood washing and drying! They didn't shrink or get distorted in any way.

The only warning is that they ARE very snug pants, so make sure you get the right size. If you are like me and you're kinda in-between two difference sizes (for me, small and medium), you want to go with the bigger size (for me, I got medium).

So if you're looking for a good pair of yoga pants that are reasonably priced, will hold up in the wash, and will make you look sexy as you work out: these are the pants for you.

This is a very high quality and stylish band. The one downside is the length, so if you have a large wrist like mine it is barely long enough, but otherwise I am extremely satisfied with the quality of this product.

I change watchbands frequently and this is my favorite thus far. I've tried leather, textured leather, lorica (a water resistant artificial leather) and silicone. Looks and comfort are my main criteria.

Leather is fine, but eventually wears and looks awful. The more 'outdoorsy' you are, the quicker the wear. Lorica lasts longer and comes in colors, but shares the same eventual fate.

The Zulu bands are initially confusing, i.e. what do all those rings do? Well, you first thread the band through the pins (pins stay attached to the watch). The band is continuous, not in two pieces. If one pin fails, the watch stays attached - very good news if you're kayaking, swimming, jogging, etc. at the time. You get to keep your watch!

After you buckle the watch, you thread the tail end through two of the rings for a more secure closure. I'm guessing the two rings on the other side are for looks.

Looks and Comfort - the band works at play and at the office, it traditional. I worried about comfort, but it is comfortable. No metal (even the rings) touches your skin. Not even the back of the watch touches your skin. There are also lots of holes in the band which allow precise buckling - it's not 'a little too loose' or 'a little too tight.'

The Best for Last - does your watch ever fall over to the bottom of your wrist? Kind of annoying, right? It's never happened once with this band. I have a big dive watch, stainless steel case and need a 22mm band width. Never slipped, problem solved, a miracle.
summary: The best  band I have have found

Clockwork Synergy was quick to ship and, because they are local to me, I had the band in two days. I mounted a Casio Pathfinder on this band and it looks and feels great. I believe there are slightly thicker sold color Zulu straps on the market but they would not have fit the Casio I put this band on since even this was a tight fit regarding thickness.

One thing I must say is you really cannot adjust where the watch resides on the strap, you can only tighten the strap onto your wrist which in my case puts the clasp in a position further to one side of my wrist than a normal band. This trait seems common with this band type however. Sometimes I like the heft of this band compared to others of its type but I sometimes find myself preferring the lighter weight versions as well since those seem more comfortable. Good purchase in my opinion. Put it in the wash machine with your clothes when it starts to stink :-)

The metal rings look good, and still hold that appearance after being worn, beat-on, hours in the pool, and just basic hard use.

Exactly as described, I would buy another one anytime.

This band showed up quickly and was packaged very well in its own little gift box.  It is a VERY sturdy band.  Fits my Seiko SKX007 perfectly. There is no downside to this band.  If you are looking for a canvas band for your watch, this brand (which comes in many colors and designs) is perfect and will fit the bill.

I have recently ordered a few different Straps off of Amazon from vendors with big names in the watch/jewelry business and felt a little disappointed at what I got.  Not the case with this strap.  It is a well finished strap with all edges melted/sealed, a rounded free end, and high quality hardware.  It is made in the NATO style with the doubled strap under the watch.  The hardware is rounded which technically makes it ZULU style, but I'm fine with the hybrid.  The rings appear to be made of a brushed aluminum which makes them lighter than stainless and will still outlive the rest of th band.  Where the strap needed to be attached to itself they used heavy duty thread and it is sewn together.  Lower quality straps use either solvent or heat welding.  Length is good and the nylon is of good quality.
This watch strap fits my plethora of tactical watches. I use this everyday in some pretty tough weather and it performs beautifully.
Very nice quality and color. Dropped it on my Seiko 007 and it looks amazing! Good price too! The item was in a nice box and came with a coupon as well...annndddd I already used it

Prompt delivery, great quality product, I will be purchsing a different color band in the future, is been months since I bouth it an still looks great but don get it wet that much, I do but not that much. I used it as a replacement for cheap metal bands and will not look back as they made the watch so much lighter and they look great on my Invicta...Awesome!!! another happy Amazon purchase..
Good durable band  I got it on my g shock and man perfect fit put the adaptor on your g shock and you ready to go

I own several Maratac brand straps, including NATOs and Zulus. This strap compares favorably to the heavy-duty Maratac Zulu. Edges and holes are smooth, hardware and stitching look good too. What makes it better for me, though, is the shade of gray. My Maratac "Bond" strap has very light gray stripes that got dingy and unevenly stained within a couple of months. This one has a much darker shade of gray, and while there's not as much contrast, it looks fantastic and doesn't show dirt or stains. Great product!
summary: Excellent quality, nice dark shade of gray

reviewText: This is made from industrial strength nylon material not the thin cheap stuff. All metal fittings made of top quality material.  This is a great watch accessory. As usual, these were too tight on my calves. But I found a solution! There's a half inch wide pleather strip sewn around the inside of the boot about and inch down. I ripped it out (with a seam ripper so I didn't damage any of the other stitching) and now they fit perfectly. The sole doesn't seem super durable and I doubt these would last through a good rain or snow, but they'll probably hold up for a while in dry SoCal. If I didn't have the crafty skills to have fixed them, I would have sent them back but since I do I'm very glad I bought these.

Wear with flats or cute booties or strappy sandles to go from day to night sexy!

I'm 5'5'' 125lbs and I wear a small. If I was any bigger, my legs would not be fitting into these things. Very happy with my purchase though.

I understand what other reviewers have said regarding the waist band...it runs small. However, I think it is meant to be stretched. I heard seams snapping when I stretched them out before I even attempted to put them on, but there was no damage done to the leggings. It was almost like when you rip open the pockets on a jacket that were sewn together.
They are worth it. I love them and after a little stretching, they fit perfectly and are actually a little slimming.

The size on these leggings are a S/M...but I think they are more like a Small!!  I am 5'4'', 113 pounds, and they fit me just right.  Also, the fabric is thinner than it looks.  Cute style though!

reviewText: These are one size fits most, but are a little on the small side. They fit perfectly for me, but I usually wear a 26/27 pant and am 5'4" 125. I was reluctant to buy these after I read so many bad reviews about the item being too small, barely fitting and etc. Not only did they fit me perfectly, I can see how someone bigger or smaller than me would be able to wear them as well. The material stretches, but if you are plus sized or a woman with wide hips then these are not going to fit you well. It's not worth your money if you are over a size 10. Also, my legs are rather short for someone that's 5'1, and they weren't too long so that's my only concern for people with long legs not that I'm complaining.

reviewText:
One of my biggest pet peeves during the winter months is removing my gloves in cold, snowy weather to reply to a text, answer a call, or look up information online.  Hate it!  So you can imagine just how excited I was to receive this pair of Touch Screen Gloves by iGlove!  A perfect solution to my #firstworld problem :)

What's in the package?

- A pair of iGloves in the cutest little gift box

My husband and I both have the iPhone 6 plus and to our surprise, these gloves works flawlessly, 100% of the time, on both devices. After use, we didn't notice any damages/scratches on either screen.

We, thankfully, haven't experience freezing cold weather as of today, so I'm not 100% sure how warm these will be on extremely cold days.  However, they do a great job keeping everything toasty during the mildly cool/cold days. I would advise against wearing these in snow/wet weather as the material will absolutely absorb water.  In my opinion, that's to be expected anything that's made from this particular material.

Honestly, I was a bit concerned with the "one size fits most" model since my husband has pretty big hands, but the gloves stretched and fit his hands comfortably.  As for me, the gloves fit perfectly the very first time I put them on.

Overall, these are well made and very functional gloves.  We're extremely happy with ours.

I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

It is just starting to get cold, so it was a perfect time for me to use my new Iglove touch screen knit gloves. The gloves kept my hands warm so far. The best part of these gloves is that they work great on my iPhone 6. I immediately tested it out to make sure they work because I have bought other gloves that work poorly on iPhone. I highly recommend these gloves to anyone wanting to play with their phone and keep their hands warm. Please note that I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

reviewText: I bought these for my girlfriend cause she always complained how cold her hands were while trying to use her phone in the cold. She loves 'em.

My only real complaint is that they are somewhat pilled after a couple of months of use.
Got these for me and my wife before a trip to Denver.  Used them the whole weekend and they worked perfectly.

I really enjoyed the gloves for a short time. Then I started to see little threads coming loose at the tip of the fingers. And when I washed them delicate. a big hole appeared between the fingers. I will stitch them up because I do like the fact that I can use my iphone with them. But wish they were more durable.

I seldomly write reviews on Amazon, however in this case I need to warn others from purchasing this product. The product was in fact a glove, it did fit and it did work with iPhone screens, however the gloves were of extremely poor quality and arrived in a poor condition. Between the fingers the stitching was already frayed and barely stitched strongly together, and there were loose strings at different parts of the glove. Overall the gloves were very light weight and did not retain much heat. I would claim that this gloves are of the quality of a one time disposable glove, for the use for a weekend, etc. but nothing longer than that as the stitching would become loose quickly.

I do not recommend purchasing these gloves. At this price and quality a set of 3 pairs should be given with an order.
summary: Poor Quality. Fraying and torn. Quality of one-time disposable wear. BEWARE!

I thought it was a military time watch. It's kind of uncomfortable around my wrist.  I just use it for work.

Great watch. I really like it. Nice easy the read face. I bought it for camping because I can read it without my glasses! I couldn't give it 5 stars because they didn't mention the bright red/orange stripe in the middle of the band!

I got the watch and immediately put it on and loved how it fit on my wrist and the way it looked.  Everything worked great for 2 days when on the third day I look down and the second hand is spinning whenever I move my hand.  Its like it has come off the center cap.  While I don't really care that the second hand doesn't work as it is a digital/analog watch, it just doesn't look as cool and I won't be bragging about my watch to anyone.
summary: Love the watch but not well made

reviewText: This was a gift for my husband. He is a real SF Giants fan so the colors were great. Lots of functions, light was great and band was comfortable. Large face, about the size of a silver dollar, easy to read also. Would definitely recommend this watch (no matter what the colors).

I received this watch today and was really surprised how nice it looks. It has all the features I need. It displays time in both analog and digital,  in both standard and 24 hour format, if desired.  Also has timer and alarm functions.  In the dark the digital read-out can be illuminated by pushing a button. I like this watch so much I'm going to order another one ASAP.
summary: ALL THE FUNCTIONS I NEED AND LOOKS GOOD !!

reviewText: I was very presently surprised when I received this watch. I was not expecting much for the price, but this looks way nicer, then the pics show! It came in a better box, and better protective packaging then my G-shock. This is a big watch! It's case size is about 50 mm. and it is thick! I put it up against my G-shock and it was about the same size. The watch case says that it is water resistant to 50m., and it is shock resistant. I got very prompt delivery from ESS, and the price was fantastic! What a discount. It remains to be seen if it will hold up to the abuse that I put watches through.  I will definitely buy some more watches from this company.
This watch is a high end watch that is durable and feels good to wear.  The kicker is: it's cheap. Compared to most other watches that are this nice, it is the best bang for your buck.
No good

Wow! I bought this costume last year and LOVED IT! Not only was it completely inappropriate and offensive -- it fit really well too! J/K. We want this costume taken down!

Again, I have owned many pairs of these type of gloves and mittens but these are very subpar. Many strings hanging off the ends, the wrist band is uneven and if you flip them inside out there are many loose strings as well as lumps of different colored thread on the wrist band. They serve their purpose but very, very cheaply made. Would not recommend and will look for a different brand in the future.

I had trouble finding mittens to fit a one year old.  This set is great because we can stash a pair in the car, in her coat pockets and at daycare too.  They fit okay and I think they will fit for a while longer.

We have a 3-year-old who loves mittens but who also frequently loses them. This package of 6 pair was perfect and exactly what I was looking for. There's a color for each of his whimsies when he suddenly decides he wants green instead of pink or red instead of yellow. It's basic mitten material, not terribly warm and not appropriate for playing in snow (they're not waterproof or water resistant) but good enough for walking around outside or wearing on your way to or from somewhere.
summary: Exactly what we were looking for

reviewText: Nice

We will just keep buying these. Mittens and gloves are constantly getting lost at our house (more likely at school).  These come in colors that match most little girls' jackets and our daughter loves them.  She is not even three but can get them on and off herself with no issues. Obviously they aren't going to be water proofed but water proofed mittens that a kid can get on themselves just don't exist.

Good price, decent product and they work!  It's hard to hold on to mittens with little ones!  These are a good price, the style is the same so I don't feel awful when I mix and match colors because I can't find one or the other and they fit my 18 month old very well.  They are made of a thin fabric so they are not good for extreme cold but they are perfect for a car ride.

My almost 2 yr old son loves these mittens. As soon as I opened the package he wanted to put a pair on and then wore them for pretty much the rest of the night around the house. They are exactly what I was looking for, a lightweight mitten that was small enough that my son could wear them comfortably and they had a thumb so he could function and grasp things. Other mittens I have found have been way too big or don't have a thumb, so they are cozy, but he can't grasp anything which drives him nuts. They are not super high quality, but for something he will use for a relatively short time, they don't have to be super high quality. They are nice enough and there are enough in the pack, that if he loses a pair or two we'll still have something for back up. I would have liked to be able to get these in dark blue and green instead of light and dark pink...but not a big deal. Any pairs he doesn't end up wearing will get donated, so it's all good. These are not for the snow - I bought fleece lined mittens (which turned out to be too big) for the much colder, wet weather and snow.
summary: Great for coldish weather, fit well on tiny, toddler hands.

reviewText: I was tired of worrying about leaving mittens at school, or dealing with dirty, wet mittens for my two boys (3 y/o and 1 y/o)... I looked everywhere to find these stretchy mittens in kids sizes, but couldn't find them in stores!  I don't like trying to get individual fingers into gloves (sorry, neither my kids nor I have that kind of patience!) so I took a chance and ordered these mittens.  They are exactly what I was looking for!  My 3 y/o loves to pick which color he wants to wear to school for the day (it is often pink or purple, so we don't have any issues with the color selection).  We did recieve the exact colors shown in the picture: red, purple, white with blue, blue with white, hot pink and pale pink.  I love to be able to keep an extra pair or two in my car.  The mittens are soft and stretchy and fit both of my kids well.  Because they are stretchy, I suspect they will even fit the 3y/o for another year or two (if we don't lose them before then!).  I've thrown a pair or two in the wash, and they seem to hold up fine, as well.  Overall a great purchase.
Perfect for my 4 year old!
Not as described.  Way too small.  For infants not toddlers.  What a waste of money.

If you want inexpensive mittens that are well made look no further.  I bought these b/c they're cheap, so I don't care if my toddler loses them.  Which she does.  What I was surprised to find was that they're actually decent quality.  For the price you can't beat them

The mittens had hearts on them, but the colors were typical for 3 boys and three girls. The weight of the knit was reasonable for general warmth not snow play. I was pleased so much so. that I will be ordering another pack next week.
Very nice!!! Looks and feels the like a coach. Just the right size. Lov it....Not to deep. Very detailed. You can't go wrong buying it!!

My daughter was looking for a pack of zipper bracelets, and we found these. The heading and picture are misleading, because it's not a set with each one $0.45, but rather one bracelet that you receive for almost $5.00. The bracelet is 45 cents, and shipping is almost $4.50.  While $5.00 seemed an awful good deal for a set, $5.00 for one bracelet is outrageously expensive.

I'm not leaving the seller any feedback, because technically they didn't lie. However, I felt that it would be a good idea to let other people looking at this item know that the way it's shown is very deceptive.
My daughter loves them. They work well - zipping and unzipping. Found the cost to be slightly elevated. Overall a decent purchase.

I liked these gloves! They were a perfect fit and match to my ski coat. I had no problems using them skiing and my hand were always warm... only sad part is that I let a friend borrow and one was lost. when we came back to purchase a new pair they were no longer available! please come back!!

It's almost like I'm not even wearing gloves. With so many high ratings I expected much better gloves. Very unhappy as I have no other option and am stuck in snow for days.

reviewText:
My husband usually gets the packages and mail. It funny he is like a little kid when it comes to packages. He loves to open them and discover what's inside. Well I knew immediately what was in this package by all the laughter coming down the drive way. By the time he got to the house he was wearing a alien bopper headband. I grabbed my phone to get a pic. Now since we have no children at home this conversation was quite hillourlous. He said why? What you going to do with them? You know the ones. I had to remind him we did in fact have a few grandchildren. These were actually well made. Not like a lot of the headbands you see. They did not break when you put them on. A lot of thes kind just are so brittle they pop first time. These alien boppers were very flexible. These also had 3 good combs built in to help them stay in your hair. These even glow in the dark. I like to order small novelties like these to put into my cheer and good will bags. I make bags of small things people need and pass them out along our travels. I feel everyone needs a laugh or at least a smile. These have put smiles on people's faces. They look in the bag and see pens, paper, hand sanatizer, and then they see the alien boppers and crack up. They immediately put them on and laugh. These are my feel good item for this month.
I received this product for free or at a discount for my honest opinion.

These are just the cutest thing. I have a collection of Boppers from Micky Mouse to Christmas Ornament Boppers. I got a set of 12. 4 green, 4 red, 4 blue. These were not adult Boppers but they stretched without breaking to our adult heads. I put them in the window in the sun all day and they lit up after dark just like it was promised. I put one on my dog but he was not amused. They are put together well and they all got to me all together. We had great fun and will keep the rest for later like Halloween or when the real aliens come. I have a grandchild that cannot have candy so it would be a great gift for Halloween giving. They came with lighting speed as always with Amazon. I received this product for a discounted price for an honest review.
summary: Glow in the Dark Alien Boppers

reviewText:
I like to buy little fun items like these Alien Bopper headbands for my girls and then donate a few of the extra from the party size packs to their classes for treasure chest rewards.  It is more of a bonus to me when they are actually a good product.  My 5 and 7 year old absolutely love these headbands.  They are a very simple design. First, as a disclaimer, the picture shows 12 dark headbands.  In reality there were 4 red, 4 blue and 4 green headbands in our package.  That was actually a nice surprise.  Some days the kids like to be twins.  Other days, not so much.  The aliens are placed on springs and attached to the headbands by a plastic prong that comes out of the headband and holds the spring.  The benefit of that is they can't break off.  If a bopper happens to come off, it just fits right over the prong to be reattached.  The headbands are definitely kids size and they have a but of bendability (is that a word) so if the headband flattens you can mold it back into a horseshoe shape.  Yes, a few of mine did arrive with a slight bend in them, but they went back into shape immediately.  These are kids party favors, not a name brand, designer product.  My kids have been wearing the headbands for 5 hours today without saying a thing, so they must be comfortable.  There has been no complaining of pain behind the ears.  Something tells me they may be worn to school tomorrow.  The aliens had a slight glow to them.  Enough to make the kids happy.

These alien bopper headbands will be a hit at any party or sleepover.  I received the headbands at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  I did not guarantee a positive review and the review is 100% based on my personal experience.

I always try to do extra fun things when the kids are stuck in the house on a rainy weekend.  The Glow In The Dark Alien Boppers - Set Of Dozen Alien Boppers, With Special Glow In The Dark Effects, Sold by: SSAA Accessories, helped me do just that this past weekend.
  The Alien Boppers came in a package of twelve.  The headbands are in three different colors: red, green and blue.  Each antenna measures approximately four inches long.  The antennas are made from springs so that they bounce when you move around.  The best part about the Alien Boppers is that they glow in the dark!
  We made some Alien food and played Alien Hide And Go Seek.  When the person who was it, thought they found someone in the room (I turned off the lights), they had to shine their flashlight on the aliens!  This game was out of this world!
 I received this product at no cost for in exchange for my honest opinion.

I knew my sister was having a sleepover bday party this past Friday night for my nephews birthday. I told her since I had these alien boppers, why not make it a SPACE party! My nephew loves aliens & anything "space" related. She loved my idea & I even helped plan the party. It was a blast with space themed food & drink, but these boppers really "took the cake" so to speak. The boys & girls thought they were super cool! They are kind of small,  so they fit the kids perfectly, but may not fit adults as well depending on head size. They are made well & stay up and aren't floppy. I left them in the sun all day the day of the party & they held the glow for many hours. The fact that they are glow in the dark, made them a big hit. I would definitely recommend for any child's bday party. Boy or girl :).  I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

We were throwing a space party and these were perfect! Despite what others said below about only having 6 in the packet there were about 10. Some of the boppers fell off but they were easy to push back on. I put them out in the sun the day before and when it turned dark out they glow! So much fun and we loved them. They were a little on the small side but that didn't stop all of us from wearing them!

The North Face Men's Standard Issue Ear Gear is versatile, convenient, comfortable and warm.  It nicely protects your forehead, temples, and ears from the chill of an early winter or spring day, and can be worn inside a wool tuque.  My only objection is the alley cat (charcoal) mottled gray, which is drab and uneventful.  I would have much preferred the asphalt or lighter gray with a BLACK trim, just like the earlier North Face model that I unfortunately lost on a mountain biking run.  I hope I will be able to find one like it someday, or hope that North Face will remake them in that color or blue with a black trim, as these have been discontinued.  It's unfortunate that "cool" colors and other good things are usually discontinued by their manufacturers.  I do not understand why?
summary: Very convenient and warm!  But the color is drab, unclassy.

I didn't know it was possible for a T-shirt to be both too big and too small, but it is true of these. After one wear, the T-shirt was somehow stretched out too wide, but in the wash, the length of the shirts shrunk so much I couldn't even tuck them into my pants.  I'm a man so I don't like wearing halter tops.  If you're looking for a quality undershirt, I suggest switching (like I did) to the Kirkland brand from Costco. Much better quality in terms of thickness, fit, and feel.

I am a long time user and buyer of HANES TSHIRTS. I am also a major seller on amazon. I would like to WARN anyone looking to purchase this item. With washing machine shrinkage, I always order an XL HANES tshirt. These shirts shrunk, but also are cut incorrectly, and are WIDER than they are supposed to be. I compared to other hanes shirts and these tshirts are 2 inches wider on each side and 3-4 inches shorter on the bottom of the shirt. When I wear them, and I have no belly, if I stretch, my entire stomach is exposed. This shirts are at a very annoying length. I am surprised at the lack of quality, something I have come to expect by Hanes. Fyi, I purchased more from a different seller "Made in Haiti" - they were correctly sized. These shirts fyi were "MADE IN DOMINICAN REPUBLIC"

Now I know to ask before I buy, where the tshirts are made- the difference is wild.

The images are completely inaccurate.
summary: I would like to WARN anyone looking to purchase this item

reviewText: Nice blouse and the material is exactly as it appears in the photo.  A nice polished-type sheen to the fabric and the color matches the photo.  I'm a 36 1/2 - 37" bust but I ordered the small which says it's a 39 1/2" bust size on their Size Chart pictured within their Amazon listing for this blouse.  But I have big shoulder muscles and I don't like a too-tight fit so this was just right and the fit was not too tight and not too loose.  I also ordered another of these blouses in the Tan, however, that one arrived in a very different color and a totally different fabric!  The color of the Tan one that I received was a very dark, dull brown color with a yellowish cast to it and the fabric was much stiffer and coarser.  It was totally different than the Grey one in both the color and the fabric quality.  This blouse is non-iron, but remember that, like most non-iron blouses, that means you get it out of the dryer immediately and don't let it sit in there once the dryer has stopped.  I found that if I take it out before it's too dry, it doesn't need ironing at all.  Also, I noticed that these two blouses, (one in grey and one in Tan), were actually made in two different countries.  The Grey blouse was made in Honduras and the Brown one was made in Bangladesh so that may be why the big differences.  I wish I could get this blouse in the correct Tan color as it pictured in the photos AND in the same, smoother fabric of which the Grey one is made.  The Seller was very good about handling this problem, communicating with me, and refunding the money for the Tan blouse.  If I could order the Tan one and be certain it was the correct color and fabric, possibly that it was also made in Honduras, I might try ordering it again, but alas, the Seller gave me no information about how to get the Tan blouse in the correct color and fabric as it is shown in the photos. And I REALLY WANT that Tan one!  Overall, I wouldn't hesitate to buy this Grey one, or any of the other colors you like.  This Seller is very good at communication and customer service.
summary: Very nice Blouse.  BUT, Order a size up when using their Size Chart pictured in the listing photos.

It took a few weeks to get here, but I wasn't in any rush so no problem. That said, if you need this within a certain time, make sure you factor a few weeks in. As far as accuracy for cosplay, it will work. The necklace Asuna wears looks different depending on the screenshot. I've seen one where it looks clearer and another shot where it looks blue like this one. So, I suppose it would be the up to the cosplayer to decide. I've been wearing it just for everyday and I've gotten compliments on it so I'm happy! Be careful though, because there were some issues with the clasp to the necklace. You may want to reinforce with pliers and make sure it is secure to the chain. Check out the video and you can see the color and what it looks like wearing it. I am outside and it's overcast.

Even though it's just a pendant on a black string, this is still a pretty nice looking necklace. The charm itself is really shiny and looks great in a light, and does look better in person than it does in the picture--it isn't flat, like the picture shows. Also, the color is a darker blue, more of a sapphire than a teal. (I'm not sure if it's supposed to be that way, as I can't find any screenshots of Asuna WEARING the necklace, nor have I seen the anime yet, so I'm not sure if it's accurate or not.)
The box also differs from the one shown--it shows a different picture, and is held together by a magnet. It's actually a bit nicer than what's shown, and would actually be great to store the necklace forever in. It's not really cheap looking.
The only REAL problem was that the pendant snapped right off the part that attaches it to the necklace as soon as I lifted it up off to see how it looks in the light. Nothing some glue or some wire can't fix, but it's just something that I think people interested in the necklace should be aware of. If you wear this with your Asuna cosplay, make sure yours won't do this before you wear the costume. I gave it a four stars because mine broke, but it's pretty good quality for the price.
summary: Nice looking necklace, but picture isn't what it seems

reviewText:
I got this necklace because Sword Art Online is one of my favorite anime, and right now I seem to be going on a jewelry-buying spree. It came really fast and I was so excited, because it came on the same day as my Vocaloid T-shirts. So when I saw that this came, too, I was ecstatic.
The necklace comes in a cardboard box that looks exactly like the one in the picture, with Asuna and Kirito on the lid. When you open it, Yui's necklace is there, looking almost identical to the one in the show (IMO).
I wore it the other day, and at least ten people stopped me and commented on my necklace. A couple asked where it was from, and when I said I got it on Amazon for $11, they were all shocked.
This is definitely a great buy.

This was the perfect finishing touch to my Asuna cosplay at a convention, and I received a lot of squee's of "SHE'S WEARING THE NECKLACE!" and a couple of sobs. Just as planned. Only problem was the string was a little bit long in my opinion so it kept dipping below my armor plate, but I fabric taped it on with Braza Flash Tape (1009). Would wholeheartedly recommend for any Asuna cosplayers.

I wear a size junior size 3 (5'5", 118 lbs), or a size 26 waist (34 DD), but I paid attention to the other reviewers and ordered a size 10.  Fits perfectly.  Packaging stated size 38/40 so I freaked until I tried it on.  Nice fabric and well made.

I really wanted to like this suit, it different and very conservative. It runs very small though and was not flattering at all. I normally wear a size 8 but this size 10 was too small both the top and the bottom. This must be sized for a junior.

I ordered the medium despite having read reviews about the sizing issues people were having (that the suits were smaller than advertised). I had a different experience. I'm 5'6" and 139 lb--the medium fits perfectly. it may even be a little big if the top is meant to be more fitted. The material is thinner than many other suits I've had, and I like this as it feels more comfortable and less hot. I would get another suit from this company if I can find the same size!!
summary: Great, inexpensive bathing suit--very flattering and comfortable!

reviewText: I'm 5'1 125 lbs after reading other reviews I ordered the 10 which I'm glad I did! It fits just fine. I LOVE shoes and so I loved this keychain so much. Over the year I had it, I got lots of compliments on it from other women! Very popular.
Only downside -- the metal (the description says Alloy). Well, I don't know enough about Alloy metal, but the silver didn't last at all. It turned more of a copper color all over as the shoe slowly turned from a pretty silver to an ugly copper. I didn't know how rugged and rough it looked after it turned a copper color, so I gave it to a kid friend of mine who loves shoes too for her to pin onto her backpack. It has since been replaced by something nicer.
If you love shoes, I would recommend it, however, it won't last.

I keep measurements of my body in a chart, and check it every time I buy clothes in online store.

The other "complaint" is that it took a long time to arrive (over two weeks, I think), but that is to be expected as it comes from overseas. Plus, shipping was free and the value was great. Doesn't require ironing if removed in reasonable time from the dryer. I love the sleeve puffs - they make what's essentially a t-shirt into a pretty little date night shirt.

reviewText: For some reason, plain affordable footed pajamas are really hard to find for babies who are past the 9-12 months stage.  My son is quite tall for his age (9 months old) so I had been looking for footed pajamas in the 12-18 month size.  Luckily, I stumbled on this product on Amazon.com and they look and work great!  Plus, they have zippers for quick on&off for diaper changes.  Warning: The fabric does run a little thin, but since it's the summer, I am actually glad about that.  When the weather turns colder, I plan to put the baby in a long-sleeve onesie under his pajamas.  I just wish Leveret would offer more colors and designs!  (Hope they're listening!!)
This product was such a disappointment.  The zipper broke on the first use.  The zipper does not lay right when my grandson is wearing it.  It's terrible.

We purchased the 12-18 month sleeper for our 14 month old little guy, who is a little above average in height and average in weight (around 23.5 lbs).  The feet do get a little loose after a night's wear but I expect this will fit quite nicely as he approaches 18 months.

The groin area is a tad tight when zippering, not sure why.  But once it's zippered it's fine, not restrictive. The feet of these have a good amount of grips, not skimpy like other brands, so I don't worry about the baby walking in it. There is a zipper protector up at the top for the chin area.

Very soft cotton, so soft that when I'm dancing around with the baby in an effort to put him down, he's kinda sliding around.  But this is not a big deal, I just hold on a little tighter :)

These remind me a lot of Baby Gap PJs, just without the steeper price tag!
I love these jammies, I am so glad I discovered this brand!!!! My little guy looks so cute it them!! too bad he only wears them for nighty night!!!

We own 3 of these and I plan to get them in the next size up when the time comes. They are great: they fit well, they're 100% cotton, they wear well, and they're zippered...because who wants to f&*% with snaps when they're half asleep?
summary: Do you want to f*&% with snaps when you're half asleep? I don't.

reviewText: I've bought a few of these sleepers for my kid, and although they're really cute, I haven't been impressed with their durability. The snap on one has started to come off after not many wearings, and the zipper on another has broken. I don't expect kids' clothes to last forever, but these are not the cheapest sleepers on the market, and for the price, I would have hoped that my son would outgrow them before they started to fall apart.

I was concerned when I purchased these pjs that I'd have issues with quality. I read a few reviews prior to purchasing where customers complained about the zipper breaking after first use. After about 4 washes, the pjs are still in great shape and no issues with the zipper so far. For my 10 month old who is warm natured they are great because they keep him warm enough through the night but not too warm to cause him to sweat. I would buy more if there were more of a selection.

These pajamas fit my 16 mo. old perfectly. He can walk around in them easily with the grippy bottom.  They are soft and seem to be durable even after washing.  I've been very pleased with this clothing brand.

Needless to say, I was embarrassed and we were both heartbroken.  All of the other earrings were able to be removed from the card without incident however extreme caution was excersized.  I hope that this was an isolated incident and not a sign of what's to come with the others.
summary: Post broke off earring while removing from card without ever being able to be worn.

Balega comes through again!

I use my elliptical a lot and ellipticals are notorious for shredding socks. Not these! They are so soft but hold together like no other I've worn. They're also great for running in cold temperatures and deal with moisture very well. The tops breath nice and don't make your feel sweat.

There are cheaper socks out there but I've had Balega socks last years and still hold together. A+ socks!
Absolutely the most comfy socks I have ever owned. I won't replace all my others with these $10 socks, but these will be my choice when working out or if I will be on my feet all day.
Great socks that keep my feet from blistering during long distance runs. This is actually a repeat buy for me.

I am a brand spanking new runner and bought one pair of the Enduro 2 low cuts and another pair from a different company when I was fitted for my shoes. As soon as I rounded my first block I knew I was sold on these. They are definitely comfy and I was surprised at how they glided in my shoe instead of bunching like my cotton socks. The height is perfect for me. I don't know if I got men's or women's, but the White in Medium fits my size 9.5 wide foot wonderfully. I decided to hit Amazon to buy a few more pairs so I have one for every day I run. As I progress to running more days a week I'll definitely be buying more.
Love these socks so much that I bought a set of the women's for my girlfirend.  She loves them too.  Plus, because the women's version has different coloring, we don't get them mixed up.

Product that arrived was NOT what I ordered. The first photo is what I ordered. The second photo is what I received. Seeing as everyone in my family wears Balega, each person orders a different look for sock sorting purposes. Now these look just like another family members socks. Where does that leave me? The person who needed these?

UPDATE: I'm not sure if these were actually the real deal. They didn't last more than 3-4 months before they became very thin and itchy. I had to buy new socks in January and haven't touched these pairs since.
I initially believed it was the old switch & bait but now I'm certain that these must have been a knockoff. I've been wearing Balega for many years and they last for 18-36 months on average, even with weekly washing.

I first bought Balega socks a few years ago. I remember first putting them on and thinking what an amazing fit and feel. They just have a perfect tightness that captures the foot, but does not feel tight (if that makes sense). They did not move down my foot at all and I never got any blisters. I also remember thinking that these sock feel amazing, but they are thin and will not hold up. Well...several years later I still have a few pairs of them left so I was wrong. Yes, you can see some wear in them and some of the their brothers and sisters have been retired so it was time for new workout socks. I tried a few other highly rated socks, but they were tight or just didn't fit well. So, I decided to go back with the brand that worked before. I could not remember the exact style I got before (name long gone and general look has changed) so I thought I would give the Enduro 2 Low Cut a try. Man...I love them. Same great fit and no sliding at all. Yes, $11 for a pair will make some people cringe, but once you try them you will understand why you paid that. Besides, you are on your feet so much of your life. Make sure they get the best. Also, if they last half as long as my originals it is so worth it.

Just keep ordering two sizes up your normal one, otherwise it's going to be too small. Luckily for me, I'll give my "X-Small" (US 2) one away to a friend. I re-ordered in "Medium" (US 10), in order to fit me decently. It;s not worth it to return it to China and pay extra $$$. So, either order the right size (measure yourself up and order based on what they say for each size), or otherwise you'll waste $ for nothing.

I order quite a bit from China, and I know my "Asian size."  In American sizes, I'm a women's medium, juniors large (5'11", 150 lbs.).  I always order XL shirts from China and they have always fit me in the past.  This one was too small!  It's very short (barely touched the top of my jeans; no way could I tuck it in like the picture!), and the head-hole was so small I could barely squeeze my melon through!  The tie would've been right under my neck, not down by my cleavage like the picture.  I'll have to give it to a short, small friend, since return shipping costs to China would be insane!

If you can size it right, the shirt itself isn't too bad.  I was expecting something soft and flowy like chiffon, but it's a little more sturdy (and cheap) material.  If you don't get right up close and scrutinize it, though, it looks nice enough and is definitely worth the inexpensive price (if it fits!).
