Pros:

As stated, they're very, very comfortable.

There's not a lot of compression (which is great if you're looking for comfort, but not great if you're looking for things like tummy control).

They're warm.

They're thicker than tights, but thin enough that when someone pets you, it feels *wonderful*.

Excellent to wear under things (assuming you're tall), and also to wear to bed.

Cons:

They're rather long (but I'm 5'3", so that definitely has a lot to do with it).  I don't like wearing them outside the house because of the bunching around the ankles.

The waist rolls down.

They're slightly transparent - you feel comfortable wearing them alone or around your partner, but definitely wear something over them if you want to leave the house.

All in all, I like them.  Not gonna buy more, but not gonna return them either.
summary: Very comfortable, vaguely transparent, and just a bit long.

i was very surprised when i received these leggings. they are a nice fabric, very soft, great texture. they are reeally high-waisted...like, they go up to just under my bra. i love how they will be super confortable for sitting on airplanes and they will look great with a tunic. i would not wear them with a shirt that didn't cover my bum, as they have a sheen to them and that would look sort of ridiculous. they are great for yoga and pajamas and running errands. i would not run in them. i've been running for 20 years and better leggings are made for running. they are a great quality and i am excited to purchase many more pairs of these leggings. i am 5'4", 27" waist. they fit fine and would fit someone taller, as they leave a bit of slack that can be smoothed easily for someone my height or an inch or two shorter. if you are less than 5'2", you might look around before ourchasing them but you could probably get them hemmed.

I love these leggings! They aren't see through, and they are long enough for my 5'7 frame. They are slimming, and super comfortable. I have had dozens of different leggings to see which ones I like best, and these are definitely top 3,and you cannot beat the price!

I bought these leggings to peek out from underneath longer tops and tunics, however, in direct sunlight, I could see my underwear through them. (It was pink, I mean surely black would have been a different story...but STILL) I expected these to be a little thicker, however they are still very comfortable. I'm 5'5" and the leg length is still long- I would suggest if you're short, look for something else as the legs bunch around my ankles.

One last annoyance, they arrived with a rip in the side of the leg, and I wanted to exchange them for a new pair, but it would require me to drive to the actual warehouse in order to do so. I opted to just mend them myself, as I can do so, but I found this a little frustrating.

All in all, they're comfy, good fit, and with some black undies, a long shirt, and a tiny bit of mending, they'll do what I need.

I loved this ring, it was perfect for my cosplay. The only problem I ran into was that it was too wide for my finger. But I was able to fix it with a simple method. You can wrap dental floss around it tell it fits then put a coat of see through or gold nail Polish over it to secure it. But, for a less permanent solution, you can cut a small plastic tube and then down the middle, and slide it over the rim of the ring that goes under your finger, towards your palm. I hope this helps anyone with the Same issues!

The shamrocks are glued in place, and didn't fall off for us.  I did iron it (tip - cover it with a pillowcase or it will melt!) and I think this secured the shamrocks because the glue melted and adhered well between the shamrocks and the veil.

It looked kind of short in the picture, but it is long enough for me (I'm 5'5"), even with a bigger chest (34DD).

The collar might not lay flat once you put it on, but once I've put it down, it stays flat for me at least. The collar was a little wrinkly when I got it, but after one wash, it looked a lot better. I've put it in the washer and dryer (both with heat), and had no issues. It follows your curves, but is forgiving on the stomach area for me, and doesn't make me conscious about my post-pregnancy belly like most other tight tops.

The only slightly negative thing about it is that it is a tiny bit itchy. I'm very sensitive to wool and itchy fabrics, so it might not be an issue for others. However, it is only a tiny bit, so it is definitely bearable.

reviewText: When i got this shirt, I was unsure of the material, just because I have never owned anything made from this type of material, but i love it. fits perfect, i received many compliments on it.

This is not a review provided by the seller/manufacturer. I am an actual consumer who purchased this item, which I saw on another website and was hesitant to purchase it there because of the negative reviews I read regarding that website/seller. Therefore, I was happy to see that Amazon carried the product, but was very careful to ensure that the item was being fulfilled by Amazon as opposed to being shipped directly from the seller. I purchased three blouses from this seller: two were fulfilled by Amazon and one from the seller. I have already received the blouses fulfilled by Amazon and they exceeded my expectations (which were quite low after reading other reviews). The blouses look exactly like what I saw online. The fabric was great, and there were no strings hanging off or all over the place. I was really pleased with the quality of the fabric, which I really liked, and they fit perfectly! I am 5'5/127 lbs and I ordered a small and the fit is on point.
As to the blouse that's being fulfilled by the seller, it's set to arrive mid March, which is approximately 1 month after placing the order. In less than a week, I received the blouses fulfilled by Amazon; therefore, I am going to find out if Amazon can carry more of this seller's product.

I bought these for my girl as a surprise for our ever-expanding playtime wear collection. She LOVED them first sight! The fit is a little snug at first, like with most shoes/boots. The back zipper might be a little tough to zip up, but the material is man-made so heating the shoe up with a blow dryer first helps make it smoother to put on. They look AMAZING on her...the perfect FM booties. She kept them on for a while, walking around our home and breaking them in, getting comfortable. Now, these OBVIOUSLY are not the shoes you're going to wear walking around the city in, and even dancing in them might be a bit much after awhile, but they're perfect for sexy bedroom wear. The heels are a nice height/length- they make great handles ;-) The quality seems pretty good, well-made...as most Pleaser stuff usual is.  Highly recommended!!

This just arrived today, I bought it as a unique birthday gift for my sister who collects all things Marilyn Monroe. It is a beautifully printed, ivory colored chiffon scarf. It's also an impressive size, like 68 inches long and 2 feet wide--just a little taller than me! It's quite a wrap. I believe she'll love it and I give the scarf 5 stars in itself but...

What annoys me is that the product page doesn't list "allow - weeks for international shipping" because only after I ordered this I found out it was shipping from Singapore and the delivery estimate was between September 5 and 23rd. I ordered this on August 10th and needed it by August 27th--reasonable amount of time, no? And the seller does not provide tracking information. I was pretty pissed thinking I would be giving this to my sister for Christmas instead! Thankfully, it arrived today the day before I need it. But heads up to whoever considers buying this for a special occasion of any kind: You better be safe by ordering this 2 months ahead.
summary: Beautiful but BEWARE OF INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING

I am a MM fan from way back.  I have loved her since I was six years old when my mother told the story of how I told my cousin how I liked her and my cousin said, "Oh, she's too sexy."  I replied "What's sexy?"  Since  I have grown up I have a lot of her movies on dvd, almost every book about her ever written, and now this scarf.  Every time I go out wearing it I get a compliment.  It seems everybody loves Marilyn.  The scarf itself is nice and long, unlike others that are too short to tie up well.  This ensures that you can wear it a lot of different ways.  I felt the price was very reasonable and I am happy with my purchase.  You will not regret buying this product, especially if you are an MM fan!

It is the best decision we have made to avoid losing documents or iPhones.  My husband was reluctant but also travels internationally for business as well as our international travels as a family.  He won't travel without it.  We all use them even for our short flights and have never lost our documents or phones since.  If I feel it looks funky, I just tuck it inside my top but mostly I don't care.  To avoid the disasters that have happened in the past, it is so worth it.

mini hipster appears smaller than you think, lots of room for essentials and fits any size phone comfortable with easy access.  black material is very black and elegant, great way to be hands free with crossbody action, for day or night use.

The only negative is the strap is a little stiff, but I can't even take a 1/2 star off for something like that.  Recently flew with just this bag and my computer bag and it was perfect.  (Checked my luggage)  Held my necessities (phone, credit cards, ID, and more and was easy to store in the seat back pocket.  I wear it cross body and it leaves both hands free with nothing slipping off my shoulder or arm.  Highly recommend it for convenience, light weight and practical use.  And it's nice to look at and black so it goes with anything.

This bag has a magnetic closure with a nice sturdy adjustable strap and many storage areas for a small bag. My cell phone fits perfectly in the open pocket in the back. I have another version of this bag but the flap is velcro and you have to knot the strap for the length you desire. Since this is black, it would actually be great for dress or casual use. I prefer small hands free bags when shopping, on a cruise, etc. and this bag is just awesome with all the storage compartments. Everything I want in it fits! Love it!

Just what I needed for shopping.  I always fastened my purse into the baby seat of the buggy with the child seat belt so it couldn't be snatched but this is so much better!  I can carry my cell phone and everything I need in it with no problem.  I still take my larger purse (which happens to match this one  with my cosmetic bag and sunglass case, etc, but all I need to shop I can carry in this small cross the body bag.  I can leave the bigger bag in the trunk and  still have it if I need something.  Can't carry my gun in it, though...

I got this about a week ago and I haven't taken it off since. It is so soft, cute, comfortable and beautiful, I have even slept in it because it is so cozy and comforting on these cold winter nights. I ordered the black and white husky hood at the same time and I love it just as much, when I got them my boyfriend put on the koala hood and promptly fell asleep in it and then wouldn't give it back for two days because it was so cozy. I am very pleasantly surprised and I plan to order more types of colors and animals. The paw prints on this one look perfectly cut and placed as opposed to another one from another brand which looks like a first-grader made it. The fur on this is stunning, it looks real and feels extremely soft and the color looks just like the photo. The lining is a soft velvety, velour-like material as opposed to the ugly fleece on my other one, the olive green color looks just like the photo. Inside the paws is lined with the velour material rather than the fur. The hand pockets are just the right size for me to fit my entire hand without having to make a fist. The little zipper pocket is a nice addition. I really like the button under the chin, it's a nice looking button and it fits securely in the loop closure. I can't tell you how pleased I am with this animal hood, I want them all now!
EDIT** I'd also like to add that if you are looking for something as close as possible to an official Spirithood this koala is the one. The fur looks the most realistic, it is beautiful actually, with darker undertones underneath like real fur. The others I have (IHeartraves brand) look more like faux fur.
summary: I never want to take it off!

reviewText: It arrived very quickly and my son loved it-thank you!

I adore this! I gave my boyfriend three choices: this one, the husky, or the neon pink cat. He got me this one, and I just love it! Beyond it being absolutely precious and adorable, it fits great, is super soft, and is so warm.

I haven't used the inner pocket (it's actually a little high up- like right under your chin), but I'm really glad it's there. I'm very tall and my hands are big, but they still fit in the mittens just fine. I'm usually wearing other gloves , so I use the mittens for my smartphone. I have the Nokia Lumia 1020, but the pockets would fit an even bigger one.

I don't use the button to keep it shut when I'm just wearing it around my house, but it's been really helpful when driving to and from work with no heat in my car!

I am very happy with my purchase. I wear it every chance I get.
Pro:
It's very soft and comfortable to wear.
It has a zipper pocket on the left side inner lining of the hood, and a button so you can keep it [the hood] from sliding off if you have a smaller head.
I have a bigger head than most, but it still fit perfectly.
The fur doesn't shed as far as I've been able to tell, and it's extremely soft.
Con:
The color of the fur is a bit less brown looking than it is in the picture, it looks more like the color of koala fur. While it could still be considered brown, it's more of a brown/grey/blue-ish.
To fit my entire hand in the "paws" I have to curl my fingers to a fist.

Even with the Cons, I still give it 5 stars because it is a great product.
Over-all worth the purchase, shipping was very fast (less than a week), and I would buy again.

I bought this to wear while I smoke cigarettes outside as it's crazy windy where I live and I wanted something really warm and cozy. This is undeniably adorable. I was expecting the fur to be softer since other reviewers raved about that and it says "softest faux fur available" in the description. As someone who sews and frequents fabric stores, this simply is not the case. Much softer, silkier faux fur material is available. So while it is soft, the fur has a bit of a grainy feel that I wasn't expecting. I have a larger head, so I was a little concerned about the fit, but it fits fine with room to spare. Overall I really like this product, I just wish the faux fur were silkier.
summary: Really cute...not quite as functional as I'd hoped

I used to always get Skull Candy headphones because at the time, I did no online shopping and also had an Ipod instead of a Samsung Galaxy S3. I found that the headphones that came with the S3 were pretty amazing in my opinion, but I noticed a few things that could be improved upon. When the S4 came out, my headphones from the S3 had just died and so I went online and found that the S4 had different headphones than the S3, and I immediately noticed the tangle-free design, which is something that I had been wanting from the headphones that came with the S3! However, I mostly wanted to hear all the sounds coming from the song, whether it be the highs, the lows, or the mids, I wanted to hear every detail possible when listening to anything. I read the specs on these headphones and I was ELATED to find that they were functional with the S3, and that they had added a few things that would have the potential of giving me the full sound that I craved when listening to music. I took a chance on buying a pair, considering the fact that they were $5 and they had good reviews, so I felt pretty safe with this choice. The gamble paid off, because from the first second that I used them, I was absolutely blown away at what I heard. Everything i had been looking for was right there! Ever since that first pair, i have bought nothing but these headphones. I use headphones all the time, whether it be like right now as I write this review, or when I have to go and do yard work. They usually last a few months for me for each pair, which is great considering the fact that I use them CONSTANTLY. I would recommend these for any android user and anyone with Samsung gear, they are amazing!

Experience:
This box was simply perfect.  Well worth the money to showcase the beauty of any ring.  I proposed at Disneyland at night (by the castle of course) and this box perfectly showcased the diamond. It looked better than it did in the showroom!  Needless to say it took my fiances breath away.  Like other reviewers have already said, she kept putting it back in the box to see it shine and to this day uses the box for storage when she goes to work.  I could not be happier with my purchase.

Box itself:
The box has a beautiful shine and the light is very bright.  The interior as a slight texture to it and soft plush feel.  I had no threads sticking out or glue marks or any other imperfections.  High quality box.  I left it in a backpack pocket with a few other items for roughly 24 hours and there was not a scratch on it.  Easy to clean, just wipe with a soft towel. Cannot vouch for the battery life yet, but its been going strong for a month with repeated opening and closings.

Seller:
Unfortunately the first box i ordered was swiped off my porch (not the sellers fault). Jeff was very helpful in getting the claim rolling with UPS and making sure the replacement I ordered was shipped promptly to fulfill my need for the big day. In fact he was able to get my replacement order shipped the day i called him within 15 minutes of me placing the second order on Amazon!  Very good seller and company.  I highly recommend them. You will not be disappointed.
summary: Perfect Box for a perfect night

After various plain umbrellas "disappeared" we decided a patriotic-themed umbrella might do better. We searched for "American-made" but this is Chinese-made. Furled and retracted, it looks like a 15" baton with a dark blue handle, and the braided nylon loop (looks a bit like parachute cord) is secure. The wrap-tab that holds the umbrella furled has a hook and loop instead of a snap closure. It's easier, but just be sure you "furl" clockwise.  We hate umbrellas that aren't well-secured to the ribs. Good news:  Some thought seems to have gone into the way the fabric is attached. The low profile auto-open button on the handle works the way it is supposed to, and the mechanism seems sound, with no unpleasantly sharp edges or anything that might pinch.  Like a lot of automatics, you should furl the umbrella tightly first, then push it down from the top into the handle to close.  The handle has a raised lip that secures the rib tips if you want to make sure nothing snags when you carry the umbrella in something like a tote or shopper.  We are more likely to cram it into a handy spot in the car -- same diff.  We've heard rumors the included nylon sleeve is intended to keep a wet umbrella from transferring wetness.  This one has a split hemmed opening to make it easier to take off/on, if you are the sort who uses them and doesn't lose them. (Personally, I told my wife the cat's either very patriotic, or has "issues.")

Don't pass this one up. The Seiko SSB025 is an outstanding chronograph from the standpoint of styling, value and functionality. Unlike a conventional quartz chronograph (where the chronograph hand moves from second to second), the 6t63 meca-quartz movement provides a 'sweep second' motion on the tachymeter at 1/5th second increments ensuring far more accurate readings. Plus the pushers offer the feel and function of a far more expensive mechanical chronograph due to the mechanical linkage.

Luminosity of the dial markers and hands is outstanding. Whether 'charged' by sunlight or flashlight, you will get 5+ hours of readable illumination during darkness and/or sleeping hours.

The 'Fulfillment' factor at Amazon (where they actually have the item in their stateside warehouses) guarantees an expedient delivery time (4-5 days via regular USPS shipping within the U.S.). Lastly, if you haven't opened or applied for an Amazon/Chase Visa, consider the option as you will receive $50.00 off your first-time purchase at Amazon.

This was my first-time Amazon purchase and everything worked out well. Highly recommended.
Awesome watch. Keeps perfect time, very fine watch. Chronograph works like a charm too! Everything I expected.

I was dismayed at the absymally small sellection available Meca-Quartz Seiko watches on the market, but I was glad to find one that had the kind of styling that I liked. I've always wanted a chronograph but was put off from buying because:

- Quality mechanical chronographs are prohibitively expensive. I prefer mechanical over quartz.
- mechanical chronographs are usually very thick
- quartz chronographs can only measure down to the second, so they are not as precise.

This watch, for the most part, takes care of all these shortcomings. The somewhat large case diameter but low profile chronograph still manages to look good on my tiny 6 1/4inch wrists. Despite being primarily a quartz watch, the chronograph can measure down to 1/5th of a second and has a spring back reset just like a mechanical watch. And best of all, it is the same price as a regular quartz chronograph watch (relative to other Seikos) and the quality is very good like with other Seikos in this price point.  Keep in mind that this is the same Seiko movement found in $300-900 dollar watches from "boutique" brands (see autodromo prototipo, Belmoto, Straton curve).

There were only a few minor cons that i've found:

- The bracelet feels cheap and light weight. End links are hollow instead of solid. To be expected at this price point. I immediately replaced it with a standard leather strap.
- The second hand (middle one on the bottom) doesn't exactly line up with the markers. The second hand still has the typical 1 beat per second movement like almost every other quartz watch, so don't expect mechanical like sweeps for this part of the dial.
- When you reset the stopwatch time, I can see the minute hand move slightly. This doesn't seem to affect time accuracy however.
summary: The accuracy of a quartz coupled with the feel of a mechanical chronograph.

Well cats and kittens, the old adage is true: you get what you pay for. If the ring didn't turn orange after a dozen wears, I would have given it 5 stars because initially I got several compliments on my "silver" jewelry.  Unfortunately, the "silver" is only a thin coating of paint or enamel and, considering the super low price, and is covering God-knows-what combination of  metals that lie underneath (lead?).  If you want the ring for fun, occasional use, then go for it--the price is right  But don't grow attached to it like I did because one day you'll look down and the cool, hippie-style, chunky, turquoise and silver ring suddenly looks like something you fished out of a gum ball machine; your finger is green and the silver is now a dull copper and grey color.  I didn't bother contacting the seller because the price was so cheap, I was surprised it held up as long as it did.
summary: Unfortunately, this  ring goes from pretty and stylish, to cheap and tarnished after a dozen wears...

It was shipped in a plastic envelope with yellow tape all over it.  When I opened it I was immediately disappointed.  The ruffles were sewn so poorly they laid all askew.  The lining was horrible and uneven.  I signed on to Amazon & notified the seller informing them I wanted to return this asap.  They offered me a "deal". I could keep it & they would refund me half of my money.  I told them, "no"  that I wanted a full refund. I never heard from them again.  I contacted Amazon and filed a claim.  I am thankful Amazon keeps records of correspondence. Within a day everything was taken care of... Thank you Amazon for taking care of my problem so efficiently.

reviewText:

The sewing is not well made, and the thread started breaking on the sides when I wore it with no care, so I'm gonna turn my sewing machine on and redo the side just to make sure it will stay all night.

I didn't return because I only paid 16 dollars for it, but I don't think it's worth much more than that. If I was going to build the same costume myself, I would definitely spend more just with all the material, so if you are willing to go a little crafty with it, it's a good buy.

very beautiful

I didn't know what to expect for the affordable price, but this was soft and comfortable.  Comes with dress, hood and tail.  Does not include boots.  The lace-up front makes it slightly adjustable in size, better to get slightly larger than too small.
The 2nd time I wore the costume, one of the bodice ribs came out of the fabric, but can easily be mended.
summary: Cute costume!  Quality decent for the price.

reviewText: This was incredibly frustrating since I bought a pair of boots to go with it, and by the time I received the wrong costume it was too late to exchange it for the correct one. Always use caution when purchasing clothing items online (especially if you're on a tight schedule). The customer service was good, however, and they did try to work with me; there just wasn't enough time.

It wasn't perfect, the hood wasn't as long as pictured, It also ended up coming apart at one of the seams after an hour of wear!
luckly I had needle and thread handy and my friend fixed it.  My costume was a hit, and everyone loved it!
It got the job done, and everyone still won't stop saying "What does the fox say?!" around me, and its December! lol
summary: Got the job done, but wouldn't plan on wearing more than once.

reviewText: The idea of this costume is great but that's about all I can say that is positive about it. I paid $47 for this costume and expected to get a good quality costume but the plastic they put in it to make the "corset" sticks into your back and the front isn't comfortable either. Luckily my MIL loves to sew and was willing to help me out. She was able to take them all out and take the waist in a bit. It's definitely closer to an 8 than a 2. She also reinforced the skirt and the top because she said the stitching was poor and she didn't want it to fall apart. The strings in the front also only go about half way up the front, not all the way like this picture depicts. I had read other reviews when I bought it and knew I was taking a gamble but I really wanted a Fox because of the "what the fox say" video and took my chances since most foxes are sold out online. Unless you want to spend a lot of time on it, I'd look elsewhere.
summary: Cute idea but very poor design and fit

reviewText: Ripped as soon as I tried it on in two places. The fox tail is not nearly as plush as in the photo and the hood and ears are both tiny, not at all like in the picture. Do not recommend unless you have your own ears and tail and are willing to patch up ripped seams

I purchased this costume in the hopes that other reviewers just got a dud, but this costume WAS a dud.  It fits true to size (I'm a 6 and it fit fine), but I think it would be too large for girls that are smaller than me and it just wasn't very flattering in the waist region.  Also, the skirt is VERY short.  I'm not too modest and have no problem showing a little thigh, but I like to leave a little something to the imagination and this was pretty much showing all the goods.  The skirt is fairly full, which makes it look even shorter than it would have it fit a little tighter.  The tail and ears were pretty small and about normal costume quality, so I'm not complaining too much about that.  But my biggest gripe is the boning in the costume.  Someone else wrote about this and I took it into consideration, but I wasn't expecting the absolute lack of quality in the boning that caused it to stick out completely exposed and poke me all over my back.  And this wasn't the nice, smooth, rounded off boning that you sometimes find.  This was sharp, rough plastic boning that literally left marks in by back and side in the few minutes that I wore it.  Needless to say, this costume is headed back and I'll be finding an alternative fox costume for my Halloween party.
summary: I should have listened to the other reviews

reviewText: It fits really well but there are rods in the back where, if moved in the wrong way, stab your back. Also the front lace stops half way up the top, making it seem awkward, maybe it's just me. Don't bend over, you will be exposed. Other than that, it is extremely soft and comfortable.
Looks just like the picture (minus the boots, but that was expected). There are some parts meant for structure that poke me in the chest, but that can be easily fixed. Overall, it is a great costume.

I got this as a birthday present and I'm very glad it wasn't my money that was spent. I got a S/M and it fits well, nice and stretchy, and the material the product is made out of is soft. However, the hood isn't nearly as long down the sides (it just reaches my chin) and the fur doesn't look nearly as nice. Also, one of the corset bones is completely out of its holster and pokes me deeply in the back. Also, the hem is off so the fur is separated from the costume at one part. Thankfully I am handy with a needle or I'd be sending this back. Not worth $40 by a long shot. Still kind of cute, maybe if it was half price it would be cuter.

The tailoring is very poor on this costume. I ordered a medium and the corset had weird wires running through it that made it bulge out around the belly and while I am a full C I couldn't tighten the costume around my waist and bust to get it to fit correctly since this is not a proper corset. I am also average height but the seam between the faux-corset and skirt was very high- at my bellybutton! Additionally, the fur lining around the hood looked like the fur you might find on a fox that had died of rabies - sparse and tattered and not attractive. I returned this item right away. I selected this costume instead which is great, it just needs an extra clip for the tail: Leg Avenue Sexy Fox X Large

I loved this costume when I first saw it online through numerous searches.  I decided to order it from Amazon in the end, mostly for the price.  Everything about this costume is pretty cute.  The good things; the t-shirt is a little thicker, but it fits me perfectly.  I thought that the dress/skirt/overall's would fit me funny because I am 5'5" and the model looks to be much taller than that.  But it fits great, no need for adjustment.  The skirt portion is short but not so short that I would be tugging at it all night, I did buy red boy shorts to go under this just in case.  The bad thing about this is the thigh highs.  I pulled one on and before I could even stand up, it fell to my knee.  It's safe to say that they are meant for one time use-which is understandable for me.  I decided to go with thigh high red socks (since I assume that it will be cold on Halloween) and wear red Chuck Taylors with this costume.  But all in all this was a great costume!

The costume is cool but extremely short- I am 5'8'' and it barely covers my bottom, I had to buy leggings. The thigh highs that come with the costume roll down your legs anyway. Also, I weigh 135 lbs and thus bought a medium and it was somewhat big on me.

I had lower expectations but it turned out better than i thought. Its good material not to short. The thigh high stockings make the outfit. Sexy but classy. Only downfall is if u don't wear the right under wear it makes u look bigger than u are.
summary: Surprised it looked good on me..

reviewText: Order a size bigger because the overalls are way short, & you'll probably need to buy different leggings because they are very tight around the thighs. The costume comes exactly as it looks and is a spandex-like stretchy material for a better fit. Overall adorable costume and good service.
summary: Trustworthy seller, good price & cute costume

Also, if you are a bit "hippy" (those girls like myself with a 41 inch hip and above, I would suggest you go up a size to accommodate due to the length of the skirt cuts close to right under your butt cheeks( not as long as it looks in pick unless you have literally no ass!!) and any movement can send it riding up to your hips, so go up a size please to save yourself and not waste money!!!  If you buy the wig that is advertised with it, be aware that it is decent and worth the investment, though you might have to brush it out a little of course.

my daughter loved it.

I bought this early, because I was worried about getting it in time for Halloween this year. I ordered it on a Friday night and received the package on the following Wednesday! I ordered a large because I was afraid it would be a snug fit and I was worried about the length of the bottom. I am 5'6 and have 42 inch hips and wear a size 10 dress. The top fit me perfectly and the "overall dress" fits looser than I was expecting. The top part is a bit loose, but I am pleased with the length...not too short! Fit is slightly snug on lower part, but not to the point of riding up when I walk.  The stockings come to my knee. Overall I am very pleased with the costume. People that complain about the quality of the costume need to realize its a "costume" for a reason...its not clothes material. I think the quality of this costume fits the price range compared to other overpriced Halloween costumes I've seen.
good quality product..

I have always loved chucky. I got this for Halloween and straightened my red hair and did my makeup dark and wore my converse and I loved it. I am wearing it again this year.

I hate dresses and skirts but I was comfortable in this outfit. Only issue I won't say is the shirt does show stomach until you put the overalls on and it is a little big in the chest. The material is nothing spectacular and the costume will probably only last one night, but it does seem to be a better quality than most packaged Halloween costumes I've bought in the past.  It doesn't feel like it's going to rip or break at any moment.

The fit is pretty true to size.  I normally wear medium clothes and this fits me just right at a medium size.  It is short (not unreasonably so) and tight (but not suffocating or uncomfortable tight) but that's how a sexy Halloween costume should fit.  The colors and details were all as described and pictured and I'm pretty happy with it overall.  I've read some issues with the buttons and lettering - both buttons are on the costume and are red and the lettering is clear and readable.

reviewText: IF YOU ACTUALLY PAID $40+ FOR THIS, YOU ARE TIGHT. The costume does look nice, but the material is flimsy, meaning they can be easily stretched...and stay that way. I'd say that the $16 price shown here is an acceptable charge for the quality of the costume you're buying. The shirt under the overalls is quite short in the back (I ordered a Small for my girlfriend) and lifts up if its not adjusted correctly. I suppose an undershirt could resolve this. Also, the shirt is a little spacious in the front as well, maybe purposely designed for women with larger breasts as the picture shows. An undershirt (white tank top, etc) could fix this too. The overalls looked fine, but the material still feels cheap. It is also rather short (more so in the back) therefore it can ride up. Similar to the fabric of the clothing on dolls. The stockings aren't that good. You might end up stretching them just putting them on. It would be recommended one wears their own or get creative and combine leg warmers/socks, etc. Don't get me wrong though, the costume looks nice! People wouldn't scrutinize you for wearing it, unless they start feeling up on you. Still, not a bad purchase. I just wish it was made with better fabric.

reviewText: Beautiful costume.  Does run slightly small.  While most Halloween costumes I think run big (so I would get a small), this one I ordered in the same size I would normally get clothes.  That is, I wear medium shirts and I ordered s medium, ignoring the sizing chart.

reviewText: Great material, soft, not itchy, feels high quality.  I was btwn a small and medium and ordered both. The medium fit great.  When I tried on the small though it basically fit, the type of zipper they use doesn't have the strength in the teeth to hold against a lot of tension and it separates but the medium zipped up perfectly when the body of costume was more appropriate size.  I am 5'9" and 126 lbs, 34B, and pants size 2, waist 26. So this is why I thought the small may fit. My biggest concern when ordering was the jacket but the material has good stretch. I have a little wide shoulder, but still thin, but even the small fit, but medium jacket feels better. If you are tall like me you may want a little kick pant for under, but still appropriate length.

reviewText: Great Costume and good quality for a costume!  I read the other reviews prior to ordering.  Typically I wear a size 4-6 but I ordered a Medium to be safe and it fits perfectly! reviewText:
Bottom line:  I have mixed feelings about this product. On the one hand, it was as described and delivery was prompt, and I think it's fairly priced. But my wife wasn't knocked out with the earrings.  Basically, a half carat per earring (around 1 carat total) is just too small to make an impact. I would say .75 carat per earring would be the minimum to make a statement, and 1 carat would be better.

Yes, I understand that to go that large I'm going to have to pay more -- a lot more.  Several thousand dollars ... and up to five figures for high quality stones.

For about the same money at this, Tiffany (the Diamonds by the Yard collection) only gives you total 0.10 cttw, and the earrings look like pinheads.  So, generally I'm satisfied, but I'm not thrilled.

The box is also really cheap looking.  I mean, c'mon, get with it -- spend a few dollars on a classy looking gift box, even if it is only for a $1,000 set of earrings.  Tiffany and other upscale jewelers know that the sizzle is as important as the steak.
It wasn't the size my wife wanted, but these were beautiful ear rings and the diamond quality was excellent. I wouldn't hesitate to use this seller again.
summary: but these were beautiful ear rings and the diamond quality was excellent

My husband save this present for Mother's Day and I was so exited since I saw the diamonds with a special loupe and the quality is terrible. There are so dirty and full of carbons and black points on them. I'm will love to have my money Back for such a bad deal.

These diamond stud earrings are exactly what is described on Amazon. I took them to a local jeweler, who confirmed the color and clarity. To the eye, these diamonds are very nice looking. Under a lens, there is obviously black streaks in the diamonds, which is why they are graded as they are. The diamonds are .95 carat and worth approximately $800 - $900 according to the jeweler. He then showed me an identical pair at .92 carats, with same color and much better clarity. The list price on those were $1450 but he would sell them for $850. By comparing the diamonds side by side, you can see the better clarity diamonds have more "fire" and are more reflective since they have better clarity. On the other hand, if I had not brought these earrings into the jeweler to compare against, I guarantee he would not have offered a lower price. Also, other jewelers were not able to match this price to something with the same color/clarity. So overall, these earrings are worth the price paid on Amazon in my opinion.
summary: Very nice and match the color/clarity described - verified w/ Jeweler

This is a wonderful Christmas stocking stuffer for daughters, friends, co-workers, Secret Santa exchanges.  The list could go on and on.  I guess ZilverZoom is offering this as a loss leader at 1 cent and 6.99 for shipping.  It is well worth paying the shipping for this sparkling shiny sterling silver chain. It is a very delicate piece of jewelry, but extremely pretty and feminine.  The chain itself should last for quite a while.  I do have reservations about the clasp, however purchasing a clasp here on Amazon and having a jeweler switch it out is not at all expensive if the clasp break.  In short -- great value.  Highly recommend for all the above-mentioned Christmas giving occasions.

reviewText:
My husband wears Polo styled shirts as part of the dress code at his workplace. I have read some of the other reviews stating that this shirt is nothing more than a re-branded Faded Glory shirt. That might have been the case at some point, but I don't think that it is true any longer. I could see no evidence that the Utopia brand label was superimposed over a Faded Glory label. Additionally, the texture and thickness of the fabric used is much different than the Faded Glory Polos that my husband already had purchased previously to wear for his job.

The quality of this shirt is more than just merely acceptable. It seems to be made well, with no loose seams & tight stitching. The fabric is of a decent weight and not as thin as the Faded Glory brand. The fit is as to be expected. My husband normally wears an XL in the Faded Glory brand, so that I what I ordered. It fits him just fine. Not too big, not too tight.

My husband and I are both pleased with the workmanship and quality of this economically priced shirt. This shirt is actually less expensive than the ones we had purchased for him at Walmart! Guess where we will be getting his next set of replacement shirts from?!? I received this product for a promotional discounted price in exchange for this review. All statements made in this review in regard to this product, represent my own genuine and honest opinions.
summary: NOT a Just Re-Branded Faded Glory Polo, As Far As I Can Tell.....

I'm a big polo enthusiast. I wear one almost everyday and am always looking to add a good polo to my collection. From crappy Walmart polos, all the way to Tommy Hilfiger and Ralph Lauren, I own every grade of polo, and this polo held up.

The polo itself is comprised of 100% cotton. It has a nice soft feel to it, but not too soft, as it has a good balance between softness and roughness so that it doesn't shrink too much. The collar is a little thin for my taste. It's not any sturdier than the material of the polo so it doesn't stand up too well by itself. This is a minor annoyance for me, but for such a cheap polo you really can't expect any more.

The sizing is good. When it first came I put it on and it was way to big. However after one was, a little bit of shrinkage occurred (it is cotton) and it actually shrank to exactly where I wanted to it. The polo is a little bit on the "fatter" side, meaning that it's long, but it's also wide. It's built for wider people which may be a good or bad thing based on your preference. Overall the sizing is good though.

This polo is good. Especially when you look at the price. I have found almost no flaws in it and I'll probably be adding it to my daily wear collection of polos.

Note: I received a discount in order to honestly review this product.
summary: Good Quality Polo for a Good Price

reviewText:
One of my best purchases from Amazon! These sterling silver backs do exactly what Honora claims they will do. I purchased some large silver ball earrings and some large 11mm Honora pearl earrings from QVC months ago, and while I loved the look, I hated the way that they fell forward on my ears since both had the regular small backs. Then a few weeks ago Honora was on the Q again, and they had a set of 11mm pearl earrings that had Happy Backs, and I immediately checked Amazon for them. Score!! These backs fit every pair of earrings I've tried them with so far. One of the other reviewers here said that s/he only received three backs, but my package came with three SETS, each in a small ziplock bag. Be sure that you wear them with the little smile on the bottom (so they're "happy"), not on the top as the picture here shows.

Get these backs. You won't be sorry!

Happy Backs are a great invention. They truly hold earrings facing forward, much better than than disk backs. I prefer earrings with the post in the center of the earring, so they sit higher on the earlobe. The disadvantage of a center post is flopping...but, no more flopping with Happy Backs on the job. There are three pair of Happy Backs in one order.  It's great to have found these so I don't have to keep swapping backs constantly.  Happy Backs are larger than standard earring backs so they may not be suitable for anyone without hanging earlobes.
summary: Best earring backs for center posts

reviewText: These earring backs are well worth the money. If you have larger earrings, that you want to sit up nicely on the ear, and not flop forward, these are your solution.  I have some 12mm Honora pearls that sit PERFECTLY on my ears, due to these amazing earring backs.  I can't recommend these enough...great quality, innovative product, that solves the problem of wearing large studs, that you don't want pointing at the ground!!!!  You just put them on the earring post with the 'smiley' face to the bottom and voila...perfection.
summary: NO MORE LARGE EARRINGS FACING SOUTH!!

They arrived today, and found that each order consists of 1 Pair and a spare for a total of 3 backs per order.

These earrings are pretty but the posts are very short and I am afraid to wear them.  I do not have chubby ear lobes so I compared these to other studs that I own, they are dramatically shorter. The backs are dangerously close to the end of the post when wearing.

Although the color is not as pink as in Amazon's picture, these earrings are definitely rose gold and have a great shine.  I placed mine next to a rose gold ring, and they match in color.  The 5 mm size is versatile; it will work in either my top or lower ear piercing.  There is a 14K mark on the earring backs, which while on the smaller side, grip very well.  For the price, at $23.75, given the price of gold, I consider these to be an excellent purchase.

January 18, 2014 update:  It took me a while to figure this out, but this is such a good price that my BFF should have a pair for her birthday.  The one thing that could be improved is the gift box because they put two stickers on it which do not come off very well.

February 19, 2014 update:  Just another comment, that the length of the posts on these earrings is virtually identical to posts on my other earrings; these posts are not short.

These earrings are so pretty in person!! I love them. I am new to rose gold after wearing sterling and white gold for years. I don't care for yellow gold but find that rose gold has such a rich sheen to it. These earrings are good for the first hole, but a little too big for second or third holes. The color is beautiful and you cant beat the price! I'm so glad I got these!

I love these little earrings.  They are the right size for my second piercings and they are a beautiful color of rose gold.  Love these earrings and would definitely order from this seller again!
Nice earrings. Good for everyday wear. Got it in 2 days.

I really like these little ear baubles.  I normally wear yellow gold or  sterling exclusively.  I wanted a change, and I wanted something that was very versatile that could be worn with most any attire.  These lovely little studs fit the bill.  They are a medium rosy gold. They are probably not as pink as they look on your computer monitor; however, monitors do differ in color intensity.  Hold them up next to yellow or even white gold, and you will definitely know that they are indeed rose gold.

In contradiction of some other reviews, I found the posts are long enough that they should fit most any size ear lobe. Maybe if someone has a rather thick lobe, these might be of a questionable length.  They are 8mm long, and that is only 1mm shorter than my more expensive diamond ones.  The backs are small and can be a bit tricky to hold onto, but are easily manageable.  They are just under 5mm diameter, and most of my other earring backs are 6-7mm diameter.  If you lose one, it might be hard to find.  I frequently sleep in my earrings, and the burden of a cpap mask with straps that move around during the night.  I have yet had one of these ear beauties come loose. They do stay put once they are placed on the post; however,  I think I will invest in some larger rose gold backs!

The balls  have a lovely shine and look great with the 4mm ones if you have dual piercings on each ear.  The earrings are well made, attractive and suitable for most any occasion.  This is a good price, and I recommend them for all ages from teeny boppers to the mature lady.  I guess even guys could wear them if they are brave enough to wear rose gold!!!
Love them. Exactly what I needed.

These are bigger than my usual ball posts, but I thought they'd be pretty in the 5mm size and stand out more.  I haven't put them in yet, so I'll have to see how they look and decide whether I will keep them or not.  They are shiny, pretty balls and the color is nice, just not nearly as pink as the picture leads them to be (and that's what reviews are for which I read beforehand).  Overall I like them.  My only concern is the earring backs and whether they will stay put.  They seem to lock on well when I took them off and put back on, but admittedly I am a bit paranoid as I just lost two of my four 3mm 14K rose gold posts that I recently bought when the backs came off in the shower and they went down the drain (did not discover until I'd towel dried and looked in the mirror).  It kind of irks me that I'll have to be constantly worried about it while wearing these earrings based on what happened with a different pair.  But if they look good, that's a risk I'm willing to take just because I love rose gold. I just wish there was a pair of ball posts in 14K rose gold that had screw backs like the gold ones I'm wearing, but I've tried several sites looking for them (including sites catering to children) to no avail. Sigh...
summary: I'm a little nervous about these earring backs

reviewText:
I've had earrings since I was only a couple of months old and I love hoops. I like to sleep in my earrings and these are perfect, they don't cause any irritation or poke. They also stay put on my ears when i'm showering or brushing my hair. Too many lost earrings down the drain or sink, so these are awesome. I also bought plain silver and gold ones. i usually like silver better but i figured i'd need a gold ones for special occassions.

very lovely and dainty!!

couldn't be better. These earrings are perfect for people who don't like to change their earrings everyday. They are perfect for sleeping in. They never get caught on towels and that is why I love hinges.

I had another set of these and lost one, so I needed a replacement. These are good quality, they don't irritate my ear, they snap together cleanly, and stay shut well for the most part. I'd obviously get then again. Maybe pricy for a small, very basic piece of metal, but when you need it it's worth it.

These are perfect for keeping your holes open all the time. I was having a problem with heavier earrings damaging my holes. These are so lightweight. I have NO problem sleeping in them, or any problem putting them on. I would recommend these to anyone who wants a cute, feminine hoop. The twist feels no different to me than the smooth ones.

These earrings are great, I have two pair. I love how there are no hooks, or clips or studs to stab you in the neck. They are perfect for every day wear, I have left earrings like this in for, I'm not kidding, YEARS at a time. The seamless hoop is perfect for sleeping, you don't even know they're there. No balls to loose.
These are sterling silver, so not sure how long they'll hold up. Looking for stainless ones.

Great earrings, just what I've been looking for.  I like to wear earrings 24/7 to prevent my ear piercings from growning closed.  These are great as they don't have any posts to get caught on clothing, towels etc.  Only downside is they are a little trickier to get in than a starndard earring.  The ring design is thicker than a standard post (as it should be), and the round shape vs a straght post requires a bit more finesse.  One went in easily and the other was troublesome, but a little triple antibiotic ointment helped slide it in.  The benefits far outweigh any downside.  I have been wearing them for 2 weeks straight and have had no irritation in my sensitive ears.
summary: Great earrings, just what I've been looking for

I kept these anyway, maybe I can wear these wrinkled nearer to my ankles with booties. But, had I known how small they would be I wouldn't have kept them. I wouldn't dare wash these with warm/hot water, they may shrink & I would then have to give them to my 9 year old.  I would have not purchased them & looked for more relaxed fit. I think if I were a bigger girl, or even a taller girl these may be somewhat small, unless that is the look the person is going for.

If you have long legs and are looking for something really slouchy and soft, look elsewhere, but if you need a basic, sporty legwarmer, these are great for the price.

reviewText: I love the handbag, but it is really small. The material is also kind of weird. I've had a wristlet and a normal size handbag in the giraffe print that were both leather, I'm just not sure if this will be as durable. But it's really cute and great for carrying the bare essentials.

The strap is a little shorter than I'd like it, but that's just me. :)

Also it's a bit smaller than I had originally thought (I know the measurements were on here, but 7 inches seemed big enough). I can barely fit a small checkbook wallet into the large zippered main compartment and still get it shut. Really only enough room in the purse for that wallet, a thin smart phone, and maybe a lipstick or other small personal items. Not much more usable space than a traditional wristlet clutch, but it is a little wider.

I purchased this for my wife and she loves it. She has a small one similar to this but she is a fan of D-B and loves this Giraffe print. The price was great and it fits her active lifestyle too. She traps it on and puts her cash, credit cards and phone in it and hits the street. It is stylish, well built and a good value (for Dooney Bourke)..
Loved the purse and the color but the zipper started tearing out in the first month of use. Not worth it.

I never cared much for Dooney & Bourke handbags.  They were heavy and seemed like luggage to me, stiff and bulky.  This is an incredible little crossbody bag and I have fallen in love with it.  I've been won over.

I have this in the black with tan straps, and now this giraffe print as well.  Why do I have two? I love this so much.  First is the lightweight.  Second, those three pockets keep my money, credit cards, keys and sunglasses organized.  Third, it's just so darn cute.  I'm not one to like things simply because they are cute but I find this in the giraffe print irresistable.  I love all things giraffe.

I take this to the store with me and never feel like I am carrying or lugging around a purse with me.  I also love how I know it's not going to get snatched from me.  Yes, it happens around here.

Finally, I love how it looks.  It's chic.  Dooney & Bourke hit all the right spots with this one.
summary: Dooney & Bourke hits the  spot with this one

reviewText: Nice looking wallet (I got the cassette version). Stitching and elastic are good. The interior "ID window" is mesh which is kind of pointless. The dimensions on the listing are accurate, but holding it in your hand, and feeling it in your pocket the difference is very noticeable. That extra 1/2 inch in width, and 1/4 inch in length make a big difference. I'll use it until I find a replacement for my old J. Crew one.

I like my wallets thin. This is pretty thin with just the right amount of pockets (four outer pockets, two inner pockets, and the elastic bands on each side). It's perfect for anyone who likes to keep it light.

Random Fun Stuff will not assist in finding out where it went. They refuse to answer their phone as their voice mail box is full so I am unable to leave a message. After 5 attempts at trying to contact them I still have not been able to - email, phone, even their own sites customer service email refuses to reply after two attemps. I asked nicely the first 3 times if they could assist in finding the item ,refund my money or ship out a new pair,I got NO answer. NOTHING. I would not buy anything from these people, sounds like the production QC isn't up to snuff anyway - fragile, broken or crooked. reviewText: We were really disappointed. This is poor quality and stopped working right away.

I can't really complain for how much I paid for this thing. The concept was cool, and it does what it's supposed to do; tell the time and have a silhouette of Hatsune Miku on it. There are also other logos you can choose if you don't like Hatsune Miku, like the logo for Attack on Titan. I chose this because at the time, I was really getting into Hatsune Miku's voice and decided that it would be a moderately okay idea to buy some merch, then I stumbled across this. It comes in a nice little box, however I don't know if it will be the same for everybody, looking at the differences between my box and the one on the Amazon page as I'm typing this. It also comes with a manual that is, thankfully, translated into English, hilariously broken as well. I only have two complaints with the product itself. First, a minor problem, I never find a nice adjustment where it's not too tight to leave any sort of marks, but not too loose where it just flies to one side to the other. It's kind of hard to describe the what I mean by that, but it's not that big of a problem anyways. The other problem, which is a major problem for me, is that it can come apart somewhat easily. I can't tell you how many times the bottom strap came off when on my bus and I just caught it at the last second before getting off the bus. I am always paranoid by stuff like that because I feel like it will come off at one point and I'll loose it forever. I'd say don't buy it because of that reason, but considering how much I paid for it, the cool box designs, and the amazing manual that you will laugh at once or twice, I'd say it's worth having if your a fan of Hatsune Miku.

I absolutely loved this watch up until the point when I lost it. The strap is made of a nice rubber that doesn't wear. The only issue I've had is that if you are rough with it, the clear cover is made from glass, so that if you drop the watch it cracks the glass.

A second problem is the LEDs. When turning on, they are bright, but when you check the time the blue lights are very dim, however look at the Date section of the watch, and they are bright as ever. reviewText: ok
Good looking but the lid is hard to open

I am in love with my Lawliet watch, I am a big Death Note fan and one of my favorite characters happen to be L, when I saw this watch and the prize I was surprised and after reading a few reviews decided 'Hey, why not, lets give it a try.' I had a coupon saved up which means that I ended up paying less than two dollars for it.

When it arrived, it was in a brown, Amazon box, inside it had one big, bubble wrap and then the smaller, L watch box. The box has a bright yellow silk cloth, I simply followed the directions that a few of the reviewers gave, clicking the side button for a few seconds, it will blink on the hour number, then I clicked it until it had the time, while doing that, on the minute side it will show P or A which is to tell you if its "PM as in Night and Evening." And "AM for morning." I've put this since I don't know if other people who don't use that system are buying this product.

Anyways, after that, I waited a few seconds then clicked on it twice, quickly until the minute side began to blink and simply went until I had the correct minutes, I left it alone and the correct time showed itself.

I love how the time comes, when you slide it open, it looks like a small mirror with the word 'Death Note'  at the bottom, the time starts to flash and looks like a bunch of 8's than it turns to whatever time was put. It may not be water proof but it has survived me accidentally washing the dishes with it or getting it wet through other ways, all it does is that it stays showing the time for a few minutes then it goes back to normal, but I advice that if it does get wet, to quickly dry it off just in case.

I love the black rubber band that makes the bracelet part of the watch, personally, I have extremely sensitive skin and usually get rashes from things like Gold, Silver and other stuff because some chemicals are sometimes added. I have very tiny wrist, as small as a child since I am pretty petite and my hands are tiny, what I love is that it gets small enough for someone like me to wear it and big enough for someone like my brother, who is much bigger then me and whose wrist is much bigger, to be able to wear it comfortably.  It also doesn't look rough on me, as if its too big or too small, its something that can be worn no matter what and I am planning on buying more of it.

Sorry this review was so long, but I hope it did answered a lot of the questions, also this took me if I remember correctly, two days to arrive, I believe this was with the Amazon Prime, and yes, it did look just like the image.

If there is any questions, I don't mind answering it.

I was looking for a swimsuit for lap swimming.  The plus size selection for that is very small.  Everything comes with ruching or skirts.  I ordered this knowing about the way the back hooks.  It seems fairly high in the picture so I thought I could do it.  Wrong.  It hooks down towards the middle of the shoulder blades, not up near the neck line.  With some maneuvering I could hook it part way, but I couldn't get it hooked all the way.  I am single and not going to randomly hit up strangers at the gym to hook me.  Additionally, the legs don't fit anything like the picture.  It's almost like they are high cut in the front.  It wasn't attractive.  I am 5'7", 250 lbs, 42DD-45-53.  I ordered the 18.  It was a little snug, but I expect swimsuits to loosen up once in the pool.  I probably could have gotten away with the 20 and been safe -- if I could have hooked it and the legs weren't cut badly.  The material seemed reasonably thick.  I returned the swimsuit and tried another one from the same company.  Same issue with the legs.  I returned that one too.  It took a little over 3 weeks for the return to be processed and both were processed on the same day.

reviewText:
I followed other reviewers' suggestions and ordered one size larger; this was a good decision. The suit fits great and is comfortable for lap swimming. My only complaint is that it's very difficult to fasten in the back. One reviewer noted that her arthritis makes it difficult. I don't have any health issues, and I'm young and pretty flexible, but I can't fasten it on my own (unhooking, on the other hand, is easy).

Update: This suit was great the first 8-10 times I wore it.  It's now incredibly worn (almost see through) in the butt area. I rinse my suit after every swim and let it air dry (rather than using the spinner). I've had $20 suits from Target last six months (swimming 4-5 times per week). I'm done with the suit and won't buy from the company again.
summary: Great suit, overall; hard to fasten (update: not so great suit)

reviewText: It's great for water aerobics. High neckline, modest leg openings, and a clip back to lend support to the foam cup bra; it's very comfortable,and there's no pinching, squeezing, or riding up. It really does seem to be as chlorine-resistant as claimed - it's certainly holding up beautifully to being worn several times a week without any apparent stretching, sagging or fading.

I have had a hard time finding a supportive (in the chest area) swimsuit.  I ordered this one because it said that it would fit C/D cups.  This is the only swimsuit that I actually feel supported in!  I've tried other swimsuits that are measured by your bra size and even those did not fit as well as this one.  The swimsuit is cute and I appreciate the high neckline.  That way, I can bend over and not feel exposed.  It is also nicely padded so when it gets chilly, you don't have to worry about it.

Update - the last time I ordered this swimsuit they no longer had the D cup option.  That makes a huge difference.  It not longer fits and it is uncomfortable.  I hope that at some point they decide to make the D option again!

I've been in need of a solid backpack for a year or so now, and finally decided to purchase this one. The Amazon price is fairly low for a good backpack, and this one is certainly a quality product.
The main pocket features a laptop compartment large enough for a mid size laptop, and plenty of storage space for books, notebooks, clothing, or whatever you could need to carry.
The pocket in the top corner is perfect for phones, phone chargers, spare inhalers or medication, a deck of cards, or other small things you may want to carry with you. It even has slots in which you can store pens and pencils.
The front pocket can store anything between the other two pocket sizes. I personally use it to store a book or a CD or two, depending on the day.
The material is sturdy and durable, and does not seem to degrade quickly. The adjustable straps offer plenty of room to slip your arms into, and the pack is easily large enough to fit the needs of any high school or college student.
Overall, an excellent buy, and I am very happy with this product.

UPDATE
I've been using this backpack for the past two years and it's still good as new! This thing has been through a LOT (college courses, hikes, parties, road trips, etc) since I purchased it and has no damage, deterioration or defects. Great, long lasting buy!

I admired these scarves at art museum gift shops in Paris, but never bought one because of the exorbitant price.  So I was thrilled to find this scarf on Amazon, at a tiny fraction of the cost. Don't be put off by the broken-English product description - or the warning of unbelievably-long shipping estimates. Mine arrived within three weeks, not several months, and yes, it did come all the way from China. This product is exactly like the much more expensive silk scarves you'll find in art museum gift shops, just without the fancy packaging.  (Mine came wrapped in a simple cellophane bag.)  The colors are rich and vibrant, and the quality is excellent. It drapes beautifully, and looks great with cashmere turtlenecks, especially as contrast against light colors, like pale turquoise.  (I normally can't wear aqua or pale turquoise, but this scarf adds plenty of bright/rich blue near my face, so I can actually pull it off.). Just don't expect to wear it against dark blues or greens;  the colors will completely blend in. As you can tell, I couldn't be happier with my purchase.  And I agree with another reviewer who said it would make a lovely gift for friends. That is, if you don't want to "gift" it to yourself.
I just returned from Paris but desperately needed two more gifts for co-workers.....so I ordered these two Monet scarves and was able to save face!  I should have ordered one for myself too.

If you want a truly comfortable pair of boxer briefs then try the ExOfficio products (http://www.amazon.com/ExOfficio-Give-N-Go-Boxer-Brief-Medium/dp/B001M0MN02/ref=sr_1_1?s=sporting-goods&ie=UTF8&qid=1405220300&sr=1-1)  I wanted to like the Mack Weldon boxer briefs but after several tries I have to say these are probably the most uncomfortable boxer briefs I have ever worn. I bought two pairs of large because that's the size that I wear in ExOfficio and truly I can't imagine who would have a large enough waist and skinny enough leg for these to fit even close to correctly.  Even if those two area's did fit correctly for you chances are you would have a problem with overly aggressive "cuppage" like I did.  It almost felt like I was wearing a jock.

reviewText:

These were perfect and a great deal (something like $8 for the two pair, I may be off by a dollar or two). I say perfect because for me they satisfied all the angles: comfortable in the waistband, durable, they didn't ride up my legs, and they had sufficient support in the groin area.

So I have no idea why Lucky seems to have stopped making them, but I went to Amazon to try to find a decent replacement that wouldn't break the bank.

I bought these, a pair from "Wanted", a 3-pack from Champion (Champion Elite) and a pair from Stacy Adams.

As I said at the top, these are pretty great. The three stars are because they aren't 3 times better than the pair from Wanted. I'd say they are pretty similar and will update this review if the Wanted pair don't hold up as well as these.

i am wearing this dress as we speak! haha. i am wearing it to work. it fits just right. it falls little below my ankle, and the waist fits great. i'm a size medium, 5'2, 115 pounds.

reviewText: i love this dress soo much just received it today. it bascially took 2 weeks !. its very long. so be prepared if you are short. looks like the picture. i will be purchasing the coral color next love it . it has that nice ball gown feel and look

took awhile to get to me but not a long as estimated. fit great. the sleeves were longer/wider than shows in picture so they want to fall over arms to elbows but looks good either way just have to keep pushing the sleeves up to get the look in the picture. i would say it was a little longer too but that is fine with me. was surprised at how well the waist fit me. over all i like this dress. that fabric is like active wear fabric so a little odd-not a cotton feel but at least i know it won't shrink.
I received this product yesterday, and it has a beautiful fit in my body... The only thing: it is big. You see a thin girl in the photo, but the dress serves to a fatter woman.

Very pretty color and a very pretty dress. This dress is elegant, yet modest, yet form fitting to show off curves. It's a different look than what most people are used to, so you have to take a chance and walk proud. Chances are, no one else in the room will be wearing this dress. I would say that this is a good dress for an art show, or dinner out with the boyfriends parents for the first time. When showing a lot of skin is the norm, it's nice to be able to cover up and still look attractive. Some of the snap buttons look a little loose and need reinforcing, but overall, this was a good choice.
summary: Very pretty color and a very pretty dress.

reviewText: I am not a fan of 'no sleeves' but I'll do it for THIS dress!!!  WOW - just GORGEOUS on, very flattering and surprisingly enough the color is very flattering.  Just lovely!

This was very good choice am really happy with it it fit perfect  as the way I want it I defiantly recommend it .. Very beautiful color too but it long you need to where heel so will look much batter I could not be casual dress it fancy dress f
This item is what I expected, nice fabric, love the design , looks durable . It's beautiful.i would recommend this item to anyone .
The dress is different, and stylish. Have not worn it yet, it is beautiful. Sexy, soft, and vibrant color. The dress great for any occasion.

the color of this dress is "coral"

the dress is very pretty

reviewText: The fittings and the quality of the dress was very disappointing. But considering the shipping that you have to pay to get it from China, its best that you don't buy it. The material has a feeling of umbrella cloth. I wonder what got into me to buy something like this. It looks very pretty on screen. fits horribly.
My daughter looks so pretty in this dress, it's a great dress to wear for the summer! I'm so glad she loves it.

Nice and fun. Thin but good.

reviewText: Worst dress ever. Don't even look at all as the one in the picture.  Don't waist your money on this dress. Not long enough and I'm 5.4, material is really bad, I will use it to clean my floor.  Really disappointed

I love it

Very simple dress, meaning it's easy to dress up.  The color is spot on.  Surprisingly elegant, but that tends to be common among maxi dresses.  It can be worn during the day, but I prefer to wear this when going to dinner with friends.  Looks incredible paired with gold accessories.

reviewText: easy to wear... can dress up or down
Dress is not as long as advertised. material is not very good, but overall is manageable.
Lovely dress. Good fabric.
Too long but i still love it.

1. The item did say red but came in looking just like the picture, more of a coral color. I love it! I was actually hoping it was coral and not red.
2. I am 5'1" and the dress goes down to the floor as expected. I like it that way though! I wear some heels and off I go.
3. The front drapes down beautifully from the high-collar.
4. The waist is very comfortable; the only drawback that I had is the back has the elastic bunches unlike the front which is flat. I didn't notice that when I first looked at the pictures. It's okay though.
5. I love the sleeveless style. Just enough to cover the shoulders on me.
