reviewText: I have ordered 2 of these dresses from this seller before, one for me and later one more for my girlfriend. Recently I gave my dress to another girlfriend who like it as well, so I orderd another one for me. The third dress I got was nothing like the picture or previous two. It was short, the sleves were unfinished, the belt area was just hanging. I was very disapointed since the previous two were perfect. I returned the dress plus payed return shipping fee, so there is no guarantee that the dress will be just like the one in the picture. For this reason I would not recommend it unless you do not mind taking a risk of having ugly dress and then paying return shipping. Not consistent.
I saw this dress, and decided to order it let me tell y'all ,this dress is the ugliest dress ever. no shape ,bad fabric ever. waste my time and my money. trash
I'm a curvy chick. It's what I expected,  just wish it was a bit longer. Sadly, with all the hips, butt, and thighs I got what I was expecting. Pretty dress.
This was a bit tight in the thorax area. Other than that it's great  I wore this dress & got great feedback

This dress didn't fit anything like the photo... I'm 5'3" and 130lbs and I bought a small. It fits me almost like a choir robe. I was swimming in this thing. 2 of the snap fasteners broke immediately as they were poorly secured to the fabric.
Nothing like the picture completely different and short and cheap look I don't recommend it to anyone it's  wast of money.

I am editing this review to be fair to the seller and the dress. When I first got this I hated it tried it on and I felt deceived so, I threw it in the back of my closet and forgot about it until recently. So I needed something to wear that was a casual yet classy sexy look so I pulled this out of my closet but, this time I wore a corset underneath and put a nice beige belt with it with beige heel and I fell in love with the dress I think the first time I tried it on I didn't have the patience or right under garments on to give it a fair rating so I am humble enough to rewrite my review! I would order from the company again!
This is the most beautiful dress I have owned and the material feels so good. I love this product to pieces!!!!

Very pretty dress. Only 2 complaints. The first one is that the shoulder ruffles keep on slipping down. The second, the material from the bottom keeps tracking any trash of the ground. Leaves sticks and much more was stuck to me gate one use.
Very pretty, bright coral red color. I'm 5'4" and dress length is perfect.  You can wear a bra, open back just covers bra strap. Classy, pretty dress & Honestly can't beat the price!
There were no buttons to snap the collar together so I had to work on a brand new dress which wasn't ideal. The style was beautiful though and it flowed to the ground as shown.
This dress I think was actually made for me. I love love it.it fits perfectly the only problem I have is its a bit longer than me since I am jus 5'2 .ill recommend anyone to buy

I was supposed to get this between the 27th and the 10th of March but it came in today (the 13). Im very pleased with that. It is a beautoful dress. I struggled a bit when I put it on because the waist line is sewed tightly but once i got it on everything is a perfect fit
I bought this myself it's u s a Stella dress I s absolutely divine it looks amazing on me.l felt like a star. .
This dress is beautiful. I will be wearing it for my trip in a tropical place this december. I cant wait to put it on.
I am still waiting for this dress. And it's been 3 weeks. I'm hoping it will arrive by thanksgiving for my trip.

This dress is exactly on the picture. It's elegant and the price for this is very reasonable. I would recommend this dress as long as you live outside of my city limits:)  I can't wait to wear!!!...LOVING IT!!!
I will wear this- it's very nice for a casual lunch. The left hand side, does slip down though and will need to be tucked- touched up by tailor. The dress itself will be worn- I do like it.
I bought this for my daughters bday she loves it .she gave one to her very best friend. it fits them both great

Excellent price for a surprisingly well made and functional wig! I have very thick hair so I was concerned the wig wouldn't fit but it was perfect and looked great. I wore it with a Harley Quinn costume. Recommend!

Great wig. Great quality and so real looking that people asked if it was my real hair. Did not get too hot wearing for a long time.
.
The wig is very small, so it doesnt fit right. I ended up returning the wig. Wont recommend this product.

For a costume wig this item was perfect and lived up to our expectations. My wife had to redo one of the ponytails, but it was easy to do and she was really happy with how it went together with her Halloween costume.

I bought this wig last Halloween and made the mistake of trying to comb it, accidentally snagging key hairs that held up the pigtails, I had a backup wig "just in case" that I chose to use.  This year, I have pulled this one back out and have redone the pigtails. It looked quite cute coming out of the wrapping originally, and I am merely aiming to bring it back to the state it was in, but with stronger bands to hold the pigtails.  Yes, it is an OBVIOUS wig.  Not real hair (duh!) - but not bad for costumes!  My experience with wigs is that they almost all make your head hotter.  Unlike another reviewer, I had no problems using this with a hair cap, and no need for bobby pins.
summary: Not bad if you are gentle with it

reviewText: This wig is the ugliest thing I have ever seen. It looks absolutely nothing like the one on the girl in the picture... and I mean at all. The general idea is the same, but it is just nowhere near as cute. The bangs are different, The hair is bigger and doesnt fit well. It is one big ugly mess! It did not come messy(packaging wise)it is just cheaply made, looks like a mop. Nothing wrong with the seller at all, the mop arrived promptly. I would buy from them again, but I could never recomment this product. I just do not like the way it looks or wears. If you don't believe me, I'll send you mine! (I say this for effect please don't make me go out of my way to send this junk to you)

I bought this wig to go with a Plus Size Sexy Gothic Nurse Costume 1x/2x 3x/4x due to its red stripes, which I received a compliment on. It doesn't have combs inside so I had to hold it on with bobby pins, which meant I couldn't wear a wig cap with it so unfortunately it wasn't an ideal set up but it did the job. It is very synthetic looking and feeling, which means it's very hot and doesn't breathe well. Overall it's okay for costume purposes but not ideal for long wear.
summary: Great for play, not for long wear.

reviewText: Perfect addition for my Harley Quinn costume.
Order came in faster than expected. The hair is great and will work well for what I need it for.
summary: The hair is great and will work well for what I need it ...

reviewText: Came in plastic bag in shambles. . Not useable.  Looks like electrocuted mop...

The colors and style are just like in the picture. I wore it, and a ton of makeup, for Halloween and got all sorts of compliments. Note that the "poofs" of the pigtails are made by over-teasing the "hair" underneath. So in person, the pigtails look a little ratty. I tried to brush mine out, since the instructions said to "brush into the desired style", and realized too late that that only makes it way worse. Was able to salvage it with some creative pinning, and everyone thought it looked amazing. For the money, this was a great purchase and it made for a super easy costume.

Awesome this wig fit in my head like it was made for me. Perfect addition to my jester costume. I didn't have to pin it or anything like the reviews said. And it was styled just like the pic. For the price you just can't beat it

Its a really fun wig. I put my hair in a really low bun and you couldn't even tell, once I put it on I used bobby pins to keep it secure. Only complaint, its kind of matted, not all smooth and shiny like the picture shows. Which that doesnt affect my costume, but still a tad disappointed. Overall, nice wig!

This wig will go perfectly with my Harley Quinn Halloween costume. It is a bit shiny, and some of the hairs were out of place by the time I got it, but it is cheap. So I tucked in a few strands and now I am ready for the 31st.
summary: This wig will go perfectly with my Harley Quinn Halloween ...

reviewText: When i opened the package, it was really awesome looking! I tried it on and it deffinetly needed pins, or something to keep it on, it was like trying to balance something on your head. But once it's secure it stays on fine. It looks fake, but what do you expect for an inexpensive wig? It does the trick for what I need, and I can't wait to wear it again

reviewText: This turned out to be a very nice wig for occasional use.  Color scheme is acceptable, the feel of the hair is suitable, and it has been comfortable to wear.

I like this wig.  The red and black color streaks are really fun.  Too many people think that you can buy a wig, slip it out of the package and put it on and poof, you should look like the model in the picture.  But I happen to know that all wigs need a little help when you first pull them out of the package.  This one is a good wig &  I have found the Franco Manufacturer to make nice wigs.  Sure, if you want a 300.00 quality wig, you're going to have to pay $300.00 to get it.  But this is a good wig for the price

reviewText: The entirety of the product is perfect except for the inside. The inner lining is flimsy and when I received mine, it was torn at the bottom. Thankfully, I purchased this with gift card money, but otherwise this condition would have been entirely unacceptable. I love it either way but I am incredibly disappointed with the condition, since I now need to repair it myself.

I loved it bcause it wasn too small . You can put inside, your keys, wallet, celphone and lipsticks ;)

It fits with a casual or a semiformal suit, all depends on your shoes.

I recommend you to use it when you want to look nice.

I bought a different pair of these in early April and was so impressed that I purchased these, too, in 2T and 5T. The seams on the 2T are failing after 6 weeks of use. (The initial pair I purchased is in the trash after the zipper broke after 6 weeks). So disappointed!

These do have a very long, tight fit so if your baby is more chunky than lanky you should look for another brand.  I consider my son to be rather tall and lean but the length is still to long for him, we are constantly having to pull the feet back up.
Very cute sleeper that I bought for our grandson who has outgrown all of his 18 month sized ones.  Was a good buy!

My husband ordered this along with a couple of other sleepers for our grandson because he loved the pattern. Keep in mind the sleeper is 100% cotton, so it's prone to shrinking. We wanted to wash it before our grandson wore it, and it did shrink. I'm not sure how many times our little guy will be able to wear it before it's too small. I'd suggest ordering in a larger size than usual. Also, keep in mind 2T is built approximately 3" longer and cut narrower through the trunk and seat than 24 mos., so if your child still wears a diaper it may not fit the way you're expecting but it does stretch to accommodate.
summary: Soft, cute but prone to shrinkage

reviewText: I have tried so many different footed pajamas for my daughter, I can't even remember all the brands' names. But all the time I came back to Gap, because only there I could find good quality pajamas. Even Gap's brunch Old Navy is not as good as Gap. However, pricing there is quite high for clothes that will be thrown out in 4-5 months. When I came across Leveret pajamas, I liked the looks (and the price!) and decided to give it a try. I ended up loving it. It is a bit too big comparing to other brands, but it's just perfect - not too thin, not too warm.
A comfortable cotton, not too thin sleeper.  Fits my 21 mo old perfectly with just a little room to grow.
Very nice . Fits well. Good quality. Price a bit high but overall a good buy. Makes my son look like a bee!
The pajamas are very comfortable and awesome color options. Just a little too big, but my son will grow into them.
summary: Very comfortable and awesome color options.

reviewText: My little one is so cute in this sleeper.  She just turned 18 months old, and is tall and skinny for her age (87 percentile for height, 18 percentile for weight).  This sleeper (18-24 months size) fits her just right.  It is just a tiny bit big on her, which leaves her room to grow.  I think it will still fit her up through 22 or 23 months of age, depending on if she keeps growing taller at her current rate.  I plan to buy some little white wings that she can wear with this, to be a Bee for Halloween 4 months from now.  The material is nice and soft.  The footies have little dots of rubber on them; she has never slipped.  She has worn this a few times to bed and around the house in the mornings, and I have not noticed any wear.  I bought some other sleepers from Leveret at the same time, and they are now my new favorite brand of sleeper.  They are all very nice.  I had a problem with one of the other sleepers - Amazon shipped me the wrong one by mistake - but Amazon took care of it for me with no problems.  My daughter also really likes the "bird" design sleeper by Leveret.  I plan to buy lots more from this brand, especially since it is difficult to find 1-piece footed cotton sleepers in her size, in the stores near me.  Leveret is one of the most reasonably-priced brands I have found on Amazon.  Highly recommended!

The fabric of the Leveret pajamas is excellent.  The cotton is very soft and breathable and holds up well under daily washings.  I have quite a few of these pajamas as I have twin boys and they like the softness as well.  I wish the bottom of the feet had a little more of a slip proof grid like Carters but all in all these are very nice pajamas
Nice and soft, high quality and the stripes match up great. Looks super cute on and is very comfortable.
Disappointing and not very good quality.  Don't bother!
summary: The zipper broke in a few days!

reviewText: It's hard to find 100% cotton footed pajamas up to 3T, so finding these here was great.  Our son likes looking like a bee, too.
My kids love the footed sleepers, they won't wear anything else if given a choice. Great products, please keep making them.

We've been ordering Leveret pajamas for our two boys for more than 2 years. They continue to look good despite frequent washings and are a great value for the price. Our kids always appear to feel comfortable in them (since they're toddlers, we know they'll instantly communicate any discomfort they feel!). We'd love it if there were even more designs to choose from.
They are still a little big for my son who is just 2 now which is great. They are super cute and make him look like a little bumblebee

I was looking for simple, cheap cotton pajamas, and these are perfect.  They fit well, and although a tad larger than I expected, I think they'll shrink over time and of course our daughter will grow into them.  No problems with them, and I think they'll last as long as we need them to.
It exact what I wanted, true to size, very nice material, great quality. My son loves it too:-) We will buy again!

Bought a 3 year old pj for my average size 2 year old, it barely fits.. other than that, i like it very much. The fabric is all cotton, soft, and doesn't overheat.. and my daughter says she dresses as a bee.
summary: just wished it was a little larger.

reviewText: I love these Leveret pajamas! They are very soft, do not pill, and are thick and stretchy. The zipper is easy to use and feels sturdy. The feet are large and have non-skid dots on the bottom. I will be purchasing this brand again when my son grows out of the current size.
Size runs small. my son is just a size 5 and this barely fits. its cute and probably very comfy i wish i got a bigger size
I know that they are to fit snug do to fire but I would recommend 1 or 2 sizes larger.
my 4 year old son is a bit tall for his age but very thin and its hard to get footed pj's to fit him just right so i bought these in a 5t and they are perfect soft and comfy
This is a nice cotton all in one. Helps keep my son warm through the night as he won't stay under the covers. Size runs a little small. Great value for money.
summary: Great solution for kids who don't like covers

reviewText: Got this for my grandson and it's his new favorite set of jammies. Super soft and cozy, but lightweight enough to not make him too warm. Love it!

My son loves these PJs!  The material is soft and so comfortable.  It is light enough he is able to wear them year-round.  The only negative I have noticed is that these are a little short in length on the legs, but they fit fantastic everywhere else.

Great product!!
summary: Great material, Sizing is a little short

reviewText: I have a 2 year old that is big for his age.  I've struggled to find pj's that fit him and his big feet.  At 2 he still wants footed pj's so these fit that need awesomely.  He loves them and I love that they fit my big boy.  Thank you for making lightweight footed pj's in size 4 and 5.  He wears a 3, but I've bought ahead so we have them for awhile yet.

We got our first pair of Leveret sleepers as a gift but during the winter so they were an exceptional fleece fabric. Come summer they were too hot for my two year old who still loves his footie PJs. I was thrilled to find them not only at an incredible price on Amazon, but was happy to see that they offer a beautifully soft breathable cotton for the warmer months. Our cold weather Leveret jammies washed and held up perfectly. Much better than the Carter's we used to constantly buy. No pilling and better sizing options. A 5T is truly a size 5. Will definitely buy again!
My tall 2 year old looks like the cutest little bee in this outfit!  It is very nice quality and very soft.
Nice and soft material. Breathes well. Shipped fast too. 100% cotton. Which was needed for my daughter due to her sensitive skin.
Quality not very good, very stretch to be a Large Size and sleeves were like a t-shirt not like the picture. Came on time.

reviewText: This shirt is nice but definitely very tiny. I usually wear a L-XL depending but ordered a 2XL. All of the other 2XL shirts I ordered from other companies are perfect or slightly larger than expected. I could barely put this sucker on. If you a S I would order a L just to be safe. If you wear a Xl then don't buy.

I like the shirt and color of it... but its thin and does not fit right. I got the XL and to make it work i need to lose 5lbs. I also have a bigger chest and it just does not fit right. THis is ment for a women who is small in general. I wear a M-L in closes and this XL did not work well for me. Im going to keep it but i might hand it off to a friend since its still a decent shirt.

An American medium is a bit too large on me, but this "medium" is closer to an XS - might want to order 2 sizes up if you decide you want a disposable top (I say that because the quality is terrible, it won't last long).  As other reviewers have pointed out the picture really doesn't depict the actual item accurately.

The stitching was the first thing I noticed as I pulled the shirt out of the package - it's poorly done and will start causing problems in no time flat. The fabric isn't any better, very cheap feeling and the white is pretty see through. Cute idea, too bad it's garbage!
The material is really thin and around the neck how it's cut out...it's not stitched. I wouldn't have paid more then $5 bucks for this.

reviewText: Extremely poor quality. I was very disappointed. Do not order this shirt. It looks like it was made by a child.

I received this T-shirt and all I can say is its horrible. It doesn't look like the one it shows in picture ,very cheap quality. I received a wrong size and it was even dirty . It took me 30 mins to wash those black stains & after washing it looked even cheaper .Ive  never been so disappointed with any on line orders ,this one was terrible . I wouldn't recommend this to any one . I wish I could send it back but I wouldn't  spend even a penny to ship it back. :(

reviewText: Ok so I figured it would be small(er) so I ordered a size up...the XL fit my 6 year old daughter and she is a 7/8 in kids. Don't waste your time unless you normally wear a S you can upsize to the XL for it to fit like the model.

I am so disappointed that it didn't even occur to me to read the reviews before I bought the shirt. It is sheer, cheap material, it's skin tight, it is short in length, my arms don't fit in it and the picture and description is a LIE. Loose t-shirt my butt! I am normally an XS in American clothing, I ordered two sizes larger and it still would only be a loose t-shirt on my 5 year old daughter! The worst part was, I bought one in each color(4 tops total). The return shipping back to china was over twenty dollars at the least expensive rate, and the package didn't even weigh one pound! I didn't end up returning due to the amount the post office was charging. I am so upset with this purchase. I never expected amazon to support a company that's basically selling garbage that's way over priced! This HEE brand is CRAP!!!! What a waste of money! Very unhappy customer!

I received this shirt in a medium and didn't realize how small it would be, after contacting the seller she went above and beyond to make it right for me and made sure I received the shirt I needed in the right size!! I love this top and I can not wait to wear it! I would highly suggest getting a size or two bigger if you order this, but other than that it's a great shirt!! :)

in the picture the reddish-maroon colored shirt option seems more purple hued. when i got it its actually a bright red. the shirt however fits perfectly and as expected. just wish it was a different color because it kinda resembles a candy cane print...

If you don't look like the model you shouldn't buy the clothes. Expecting a shirt to fit you like the model is not realistic. Its going to take more then a shirt for you to look like that. Hit the gym and eat right. Its not their fault your out of shape.
I do not recommend this product. I have bought a lot from this company and this is the only shirt a I not recommend. It seems they just pieced fabric together and sold it!

This shirt is cute, but too small. I ordered a size larger than what I normally wear, but it was still too small. I ended up having to give it to my daughter who wears a small. The shirt was an XL so make sure if you order this shirt you accommodate for the very small size.
I could not find these is stores around here but these are great probably will last me the rest of my life

reviewText: These things went out of style like 40 years ago. I look like an old fogey, but I like using them. I was pleasantly surprised to find them here on Amazon.

I have had two of these,one I wore out the other I lost. Can not find anywhere except from Amazon dealers. I did not want three
or one with the key chain and I knew the postage would be high but I did not think there would be any problem.
When I got the shipping envelope open the purses were in a plastic bag that looked like it had been in a microwave oven for
five or six minutes,same with the purses they were stuck together and none of the three would open and shut properly.
For the price not even worth sending back would need new shipping envelope,pay postage take the time and gas to the post
office plus I could not get any form for return authorization.
This would not have happened if it were Amazon direct instead of a dealer,
Amazon is great but you take your chances with dealers.

reviewText: I have been using this type of product for a long time, and I am glad that I was able to find some on Amazon.  Nice thick rubber, easily squeezable, and they will last for a long time.

I've been looking for this change purse. It was around years ago. It's just perfect.  I like it because it's small and hold coins (as long as you don't overload it) won't slip out. I'm  ordering more for my family and friends. Thank you Coin Purse Factory!!!
summary: It was just what I was looking for!!!

reviewText: rubber squeeze coin holders  ii was what I wanted so I can keep the change in instead of my pocket

These are better than the one I had. Great to have more
than one; they are a bit larger than I thought.
Excellent quality!
MY DAD HAS BEEN USING THESE EVER SINCE I WAS A CHILD BUT THEY CAN'T BE FOUND IN STORES ANYMORE.  HE LOVED THEM!

These are the real deal, good, genuine rubber. Too many imitators out there today. Don't be fooled by vinyl imitators ; this one is real supple leather. Be unique and stylish and carry just the right amount of change in your pocket or purse.  Don't let your change rattle all over your bag or pockets.  This is a unique blast from the past and these are not so easy to find in this quality any more.
summary: Love the old timey squeeze coin purses like Grandaddy had.

reviewText: 0Perfect, it is what I expected and they do not split (tear) when opened up.

This is my final trial of any squeeze coin holders. Back in the 70s when they were a fad, I had fairly good results--the coins were kept clean and shiny. Now the last few that I bought felt like rather crappy plastic, and the pennies turned green, and the green pennies turned everything else green including the squeeze coin holder. If this particular item doesn't work, that's it, I'm giving up on "squeezables". So, only time will tell if I'm actually happy with this purchase. On the plus side, these seem to NOT be cheap plastic, they seem to smell like rubber--could they in fact BE
actual rubber? I sure hope so! But, like I said, only time will tell. I'll try to remember to report back after I decide "thumbs up" or "thumbs down",
but don't hold your breath as it will be a long while. Lastly, one negative is that I couldn't find these with a quantity of one.
